story:
14 months ago we had a successful crowd-funding campaign to raise money for these amazing kids. We’re back again (this time as a registered tax exempt 501c3 charity) with slightly loftier goals....

ORPHAN STUDENTS in RWANDA:
It’s been a busy year for We Are Limitless (WAL). We have grown from our initial 3 students to sponsoring 23 orphaned children in primary, secondary, and University. WAL provides all of them with tuition, room & board, medical insurance, clothing, and just about anything a child would need to get them through life.

During the June visit to Rwanda we promised 6 more students to bring them into the WAL family by year’s end. The trip also allowed Matt to check in on most of the children personally, to assess their individual challenges and needs and further one of WAL's primary initiatives - To encourage critical thinking and independent thought.

It was exciting to see that many students have exceeded our projections. Though a few others have been having some difficulties adjusting to the structure and workload of their boarding schools. That said, there are some individual stories that are worth mentioning. Marie, an 8yr old in Primary school, who began studying at Maranatha School in January, just ranked first in her class of 42 in last semesters final exams. The private tutor we hired for Jean Paul has begun paying dividends and his grades have gone up for the past two semesters. Emmanuel G. (We have 3 students named Emmanuel)  is our first University student to graduate and, with the help of WAL, will be starting his accounting internship this September.

WAL and THE CONGO:
The trip also included traveling across the border to the war torn Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) to visit our friend Augustin Twagara who, with his Centre D’Education A La Non Violence (CENOVI), is helping orphans and women of sexual abuse in that country. With estimates as high as 8 million people killed in the conflicts that have engulfed Congo since 1996, there are now 800,000 orphans living in the country. DRC also has an insanely high number of victims of rape with 1,100 women raped there every day.

Matt spent time at two of Augustin’s sites where they are caring for over 200 children and women who have no place to go. In one site he visited 76 children aged 2-14 who were crammed into a 275 sq foot wood hut with a dirt floor where they literally slept on top of each other. The following day he had lunch with a young woman named Yvette who told her story of how she was awakened in the middle of the night by soldiers who raided her home, killed her father, and raped her and her younger sister. With nowhere to go she found her way to Augustin’s group and they have been doing what they can to help her get back on her feet.

Given only one meal of beans and rice a day, these women and children are in desperate need of proper food and shelter as well as an opportunity for an education. This is where WAL is looking to help by teaming with CENOVI on a new project in Congo. All funds over $15,000 raised on this campaign (as well as 70 percent of the money raised at the Annual Celebrity Poker Tournament) will go towards building a facility in Goma city, DRC to house these women and children, provide them with counseling, medical attention, work training, and preparation to attend school. The total cost to acquire the plot and build the facility is $65,000.

Think about that! $65,000 to completely change over 200 people's lives. Yes we will need more money to support the various programs over the years but this would be a huge boost and provide the safety that these women and children deserve.

In making a donation to WAL you will not only be helping our amazing students but you will also be contributing to the women whose gifts we purchased for the perks of this campaign. The jewelry and baskets that you will receive for your donation have been made by hand by women living in Rwandan villages. Many suffer from HIV and this is their primary source of income.

  • $35 pays for a years worth of clothing for a child / student.
  • $50 pays for a years worth of school required shoes for a child / student.
  • $65 pays for a months housing for a University student.
  • $100 pays for a month of private English tutoring.
  • $150 pays for medical insurance for an entire year for a child / student.
  • $600 pays for a month of WAL’s Rwandan team salaries.
  • $1300 pays for a year's tuition and housing for a child / student.
Images of PERKS can be seen in the Gallery page of this campaign.

All Donations Are Tax-Deductible.
You will receive a receipt for your taxes via email.

Please be sure to pass this campaign on to your friends and family. Thank you for all of your support!

*We will be announcing the date for our 2nd Annual Celebrity Poker Tournament in the coming weeks. We hope to see you there.

For more information on how to get involved or to put your name on our mailing list for the Poker Tournament and other updates contact us at info@wearelimitless.org

Rwanda Facts / History:

  • Rwanda has one of the world’s worst child mortality rates – one in five Rwandan children die before their fifth birthday. Malaria is the leading cause of infant and child mortality (29 per cent).
  • Rwanda has one of the world’s largest proportions of households that are headed by children (i.e. children raising children) with an estimated 101,000 children heading up some 42,000 households.
  • UNICEF estimates that over 1,000,000 children were orphaned as a result of the 100 day Rwandan genocide (equal to 12 percent of the entire population of Rwanda).
  • Currently, more than half of the population of Rwanda is under 19.

Congo Facts / History:

  • 1100 women are raped each day in Congo.
  • Nearly 8 million have died from the fighting there since 1996.
  • Consistently ranks in the 20 most corrupt nations in the world.
  • Through 2013 the Democratic Republic of the Congo had the lowest Human Development Index of the 187 ranked countries.

story:
Short Summary

This January, Amaha Girma will walk 430 km from Addis Ababa to a village called Ganzilla to raise $25,000. If he meets his goal, 2,200 people will have access to clean water for the first time in their lives. This will be the first fundraising walk ever held in Ethiopia.

Amaha works as a driver in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. While he certainly isn’t a wealthy man, he gives more to his local community than many people do in a lifetime. You can read more about Amaha and his community projects here.

Amaha discovered the community of Ganzilla earlier this year while working for a Canadian NGO called imagine1day.

Although Ganzilla is in the highlands of the Bale Zone, where it rains almost six months a year, this village has no access to clean water—the ground water is simply too deep to dig a well. Residents walk three kilometers to fetch water each day from a nearby stream surrounded by farmland and cattle.

As a result, kids keep getting sick. When Amaha was in Ganzilla, he saw a girl with a large potbelly. He brought her to a doctor in the nearest town, and they found 35 parasites living in her tiny body. The doctor came back to the village with Amaha and found another 80 kids with parasites.

Today, thanks largely to Amaha, children in Ganzilla are taught basic hygiene and instructed on the importance of boiling water before they use it. Still, each time he returns to the village, more children are sick.

As a father of three (with one more on the way!), Amaha couldn’t stand by doing nothing, so he decided to embark on this Walk for Water.

Please sponsor Amaha on his walk. With a small contribution, you have the power to help more than 2,200 children and villagers live healthier, happier lives.

What We Need & What You Get

Before Amaha decided to embark on this Walk for Water, he met with the Water Office in the district of Sinana where the village of Ganzilla is located. The Water Office has found a natural spring near Ganzilla that could be developed for just 500,000 birr ($25,000).

Amaha is currently asking people to sponsor kilometers of his walk. So far, he has already raised 60,000 birr ($3,000) with local support.

When Amaha completes his walk in January, he will arrive to the village of Ganzilla with 12 doctors from Robe, the nearest town, who have volunteered to give treatments to all the children who are sick. Meanwhile, the district of Sinana, where Ganzilla is located, has committed to completing the development of the natural spring within one month of receiving the funds.

If Amaha exceeds his goal, the excess funds will be used to purchase oxen for the community. These will be fattened and sold at profit, allowing the community to independently maintain their school and water development in the months and years to come.

If crowd funding does not allow Amaha to meet his goal, he will seek out partnerships with local NGOs to meet the funding gap. The money you donated will only be withdrawn when there is enough money to develop the natural spring. It will not be spent on any other projects (except for cattle fattening as mentioned above, if the goal is exceeded).

All supporters of Amaha’s Walk for Water will receive email updates and photos before and after Amaha’s walk, and an update from the community when the well is built.

The Impact

Ethiopia has one of the lowest rates of clean water and sanitation access in Sub-Saharan Africa and the world.

In Ganzilla, women and girls spend hours each day walking to the nearest stream only to collect dirty water that makes people sick. Water born diseases are having a significant impact on student enrollment and attendance. Even when children do attend classes, if they aren’t well hydrated, they get dizzy and fall asleep. Meanwhile, overall community production in the fields is also suffering.

When someone does get sick, they must travel 37 km to Robe, the nearest town, to get medical treatment. With no vehicle, the journey takes three to four hours on foot.

Having access to a clean source of water in the village will have a dramatic impact on the women and girls of Ganzilla, who are responsible for fetching water. The entire community will also benefit from improved health and productivity.

Risks & Challenges

Amaha’s Walk for Water faces three main risks and challenges:

1.  Amaha could get sick or injured during the trip. To ensure that Amaha reaches Ganzilla safely, the Sinana district government and local charities working in the sector have committed to assisting Amaha during his walk. They will assign a car to follow Amaha during his entire journey.

2.  Amaha may not reach his $25,000 goal. If Amaha does not meet his goal by January through crowd funding, he will begin asking local charities working in the region to provide matching funding. Any funds raised through crowd funding will remain in the bank account set up for this campaign until the goal is met.

3.  You may not trust him. To ensure accountability in all his fundraising efforts, Amaha will collect no cash during his campaign. Instead, Amaha set up a bank account dedicated to the water project that requires five signatures to approve any withdrawal. A government official from the district of Sinana, three community members from Ganzilla village, and a staff member from imagine1day (the NGO Amaha works for), all have to sign their approval before money is removed from the account. People can only contribute by making direct deposits into this account, and money will only be removed when the $25,000 goal is met.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't have any money to contribute today? That's ok! Please just share Amaha's campaign with all your friends! Together, we can help the 2,200 residents of Ganzilla live healthier, happier lives.

Amesegenalo! Galatoma! Thank you!

story:
Boozestones & Gentleman's Box Have Teamed Up

Thanks to the explosive success of Boozestones, it's global attention and continued support, we have teamed up with Gentleman's Box to offer you a once in a lifetime deal.

You only have a matter of days to jump in on the action...

Get your hands on a Box of Boozestones & a  Gentleman's Box on a one month trial for just $40 ... Substantially lower than the RRP!

Don't hesitate, get in on the action now! This offer won't be around ever again.


Short Summary

BoozeStones was founded by a Montrealer; who desired the ultimate taste when sipping on a glass of his favourite irish Whisky. Adding ice cubes only provided that cool crisp taste for a short moment; once the cubes started to melt the whiskey became diluted. Which is when the soapstone alternative later named "Boozestones" was born.

Presenting BoozeStones; a safe, efficient, and environmentally friendly alternative to ice. Taking your pleasure to a new level.  Enjoy your spirits and cold beverages without watering them down. Help us bring BoozeStones into your homes by donating to our campaign. We need your support. Thank you.

Who we are

We believe if you are going to enjoy a beverage you should be able to enjoy it in its natural state, not watered down. BoozeStones are meant to heighten the taste, feeling, and sensation you get when sipping on a drink of your choice. We’ve had amazing feedback and support so far and we are grateful that we can begin to receive further support through the IndieGoGo community. We are a new company that's committed to providing a quality, environmentally friendly product everyone can enjoy.


What We Need & What You Get

We need 1000$ to begin our first line of production and guarantee a quality product with an affordable price point. The donations we receive will be used to fund production, packaging, and shipping.

As a big "Thank You" for your contribution, you will receive nine ice shaped soapstone rocks as well as a velvet casing to keep them in. Enabling you to finally appreciate and endure the taste of your chosen beverage.

But that's not all! As your generosity will enable us to produce BoozeStones and reach a wider audience of consumers & contributors.

The Impact

Being a small business we are working around the clock in a attempt to bring this quality product to the world; without your contributions this wouldn’t be possible.


With your help we can finally bring a product to the market that aids in decreasing the wastage of water used to cool people's drinks; whilst providing a much more pleasurable and enjoyable drinking experience.


Other Ways You Can Help

Supporting our product in any way is all we can ask. There is more than one way you can contribute to our campaign and help us reach our goal. Sharing this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets is equally as valuable to us. We would like to thank you in advance for you contributions and continuing support.


Once you contribute you can qualify for our Referral Based Prizes! You must be logged into your IndieGoGo account and using IndieGoGo's share tools you can track your referrals. You can track your referrals by looking into your IndieGoGo Profile. It's fun and easy. 



Benefits for your Business

Purchasing BoozeStones in larger quantities can be very financially appealing, whether it is to offer your guests as a thank you, or be used in others ways. For example, if you own a restaurant, bar, or lounge, it could be a great idea to have guests leave with a little velvet bag with your logo on it with precious stones inside. 



STRETCH GOAL

We would like to thank you all for your support! We reached our goal and are continuing to receive such great feedback so we have decided to add a STRECH GOAL.

If we receive 5000$ we will send ever contributor a BoozeStones Puck in addition to their selected perk. A BoozeStones Puck is a puck shaped soapstone rock that will sit at the bottom of any glass to keep it cool!

If we receive over 8000$ of contributions we will begin production on the newest addition to our BoozeStones line, soapstone shot glasses! BoozeStones Shot Glasses will be made from the same soapstone material as BoozeStones, and are super efficient when serving shots to guests at home or in a bar. Then everyone can enjoy cold shots of their favorite drinks at any time :)



Frequently asked Questions?

Q. Is Shipping & Handling included in your purchase?

A. Depending on which Perk you have chosen Shipping & Handling may or may not apply. Please feel free to comment if you have any questions about whether S&H applies to you.

Q. How long do BoozeStones keep you drink cool?

A. They stay cool on average three times longer than ice cubes. 


Q. How do you wash your boozestones?

A. Rinse under luke warm water, dry, place back in velvet bag, and store in freezer.


Q. How long will they last?

A. Soapstone is a rock and as long as you don’t loose them, they will last forever ☺


Q. What is included in a Boozestone box?

A. In our BoozeStone Box there are : 9 BoozeStones, our ice-shaped soapstones, and 1 velvet storage bag.


**If you have any other questions, please don’t hesitate to put them in the comment box and we will answer them as best we can.

Adding ice cubes only provided that cool crisp taste for a short moment; once the cubes started to melt the whiskey became diluted. pleasure to a new level.  Enjoy your
spirits and cold beverages without watering them down. Help us bring BoozeStones into your homes by

story:
Patriots Ghana University Chapters (UCC, Legon, KNUST and MUCG) have decided to volunteer 1 to 2weeks of their summer long vacation every year to provide support for one of the poorest communities in Ghana and help them with some basic needs including social amenities.

Patriots Ghana is a registered non-profit non-governmental organization that seeks to develop, encourage and empower Ghanaian citizens and organizations to undertake community services geared towards national development. Jei Krodua -Yamoah Nkwanta, the town selected is in the Awutu Senya District that’s in the Central Region of Ghana.

The village has a population of about (800) eight hundred and currently lacks access to any basic social amenity. Though there are several challenges or needs, one of the most pressing needs of the community is access to portable water. The locals currently resort to a stagnant water source for their domestic activities and it has the potential of enhancing water borne diseases.

The government of Ghana under the Sustainable Rural Water and Sanitation project sponsored by the World Bank (WB) drilled a borehole for the community and other nine others in the district. Unfortunately, funding for the project seized and the constructors halted the project since 2008, but had finished with the drilling. Addition to this challenge the community also lacks a toilet facility and further enhancing the potential for increased water borne diseases.

(Borehole Under construction)

According to the health records in the district, most of the health cases from this community and its environs are as a result of poor and bad water sources. The nonexistence of a health facility also makes it impossible for the community to handle some of these health problems resulting from contaminated water source. Children who have been sick and drop out of schools due to contaminated water and basic health issues is increasing and has resulted in increased school dropout rate.

This has become a great need and why Patriots Ghana University Chapters has decided to help provide a source of Potable water for the Yamoah Nkwanta Village. Aside that they would be offering free teaching and evening classes to the children in the village to help improve their academic performance and also engage the whole community in public health education on various health issues especially those that are related to sanitation and hygiene.

The Patriots team has visited the village on several occasions to do a feasibility study, officially meet the chiefs and community leaders, and interact with the locals to identify the problems of the community and how best they can be solved. The team has also made an official visit to the District Chief Executive of the district, Lieutenant Daniel Osardu (Retired) and has received approval and the support of his high office.

Patriots Ghana is soliciting for support financially, materially or any kind of assistance so we can provide the community with this basic need and solve the problems that are associated with the lack of these social amenities.
Kindly contact us on:
Mobile: +233247602583, +233542538353 +233262626182.
Email: patriotsknust@gmail.com, info@patriotsghana.org.

www.patriotsghana.org

www.facebook.com/patriotsghana

Cover letter from District Chief Executive

story:
Summary: There is significant public interest in the 2014 municipal election campaign in Winnipeg. For the first time in a decade, an incumbent mayor’s name will not be on the ballot, and a higher-than-average number of candidates have stepped forward to compete for the city’s highest political office.

As the campaign has heated up over the summer, many have been anxious to know how much support each of these eight candidates have among Winnipeggers. The most recent public polls were conducted more than six months ago, before some of the candidates entered the race. Given this intense interest and the absence of current public opinion surveys, we want to give Winnipeggers the opportunity to see how voters are reacting to these candidates.

But here’s the thing. Rigorously conducted scientific surveys are costly. Organizations that have traditionally sponsored public opinion polls are dealing with decreasing revenues, which has led them to cut back on the amount of polling that they underwrite. Some research firms conduct polls for the media for free, hoping to obtain publicity. The proliferation of these surveys – many of which use questionable methodologies and/or do not disclose important methodological information – has led to a crisis of confidence in the market research industry. Probe Research, which is extremely proud of its strong track record for conducting accurate and rigorous polling during election campaigns, will not join others in this “race to the bottom” by providing dubious survey results on the cheap.

Fortunately, we have devised a creative method of obtaining accurate and valid survey results. We are launching Manitoba’s first-ever “crowdfunded” survey on the Winnipeg mayoral race. By making a pledge, you will help fund a unique and innovative method of tracking where the mayoral candidates currently stand among Winnipeggers.

The details:

·  Project cost: $8,000

·  We are conducting an online survey of a representative sample of 600 Winnipeg adults

·  The deadline to pledge for this survey is August 27

·  The survey goes into field from August 28-September 4

·  The results will be released to funders by September 10, with the results publicly released by September 12

story:
Why create a Crossguard Light Sword?

Because is the newest light sword in the universe, just a few will be the lucky ones to have this unique sword.

Features


  • Bright LED lights.
  • Real fighting sounds.
  • Handle with vibration for motion feedback.

Measurements

  • 26 inches high 
  • 12 inches long 
  • 2 inches diameter

Light Colors

Dark Red

Force Green

Spirit Blue

Sand Orange

Cosmic Magenta


Indiegogo Special Launch Support

$15 for 1 Crossguard Light Sword (+$5 shipping)
$70 for 5 Crossguard Light Swords (+$20 shipping)

Shipment Date 7-7-15

If the Indiegogo campaign is successful we will start shipping the swords on July 7th 2015. The first prototypes will be ready on March 15th, 2015 and we will post here any update we have.

Our Work

We are a small toy development company from Austin, TX and Hong Kong. We focus on creating innovative electronic novelty toys. Usually we first pitch our ideas to big toy companies or retailers so we can get funded and produce the products, so this is our first time that we pitch a totally new development in Indiegogo as we believe this product is special and has to be in the market faster. 

Also we want to have your feedback to make the item better, so please share with us any comments you have.

Here are some pictures of other items we had developed in the past:

story:
It is with heavy hearts that we share the following story

Adam Lara and his father, Uriel, were attacked and shot after lunch together on the northwest side of Chicago. Uriel survived the attack and is in critical condition, but Adam was killed. Uriel Lara is a faithful member of Team Universal Sole and the greater Chicago running community. Because we believe in the power of community and take seriously our commitment to one another as human beings first and runners second, our fun run scheduled for Monday, July 21 at 6:30pm will be dedicated to the memory of Uriel's son, Adam.

For the first time in our history, we will charge admission to a fun run. Please be prepared to make a $20 donation in Adam's memory to help the Laras pay for their son's funeral as well as assist in offsetting the costs of hospital bills. In addition to your donations, Universal Sole is committing 15 percent of all their sales on Monday, July 21 to the same cause.

Whether you know Uriel and his family or not, are a member of Team Universal Sole or run elsewhere, please join us on Monday, July 21 at 6:30pm at our Lakeview location (3052 N. Lincoln). Somos corredores a veces. Somos siempre amigos.

http://my.chicagotribune.com/#section/-1/article/p2p-80805919/


Adam's funeral costs are coming out to $8,800, on top of hospital bills and we're hoping to help offset the costs as much as we can. We have kept the goal amount low to assure the Lara family will receive as much assistance as possible.

Other ways to help

For those who are unable to contribute monetarily, you can help in other ways:

  • We are requesting help with the provision of meals for Uriel and his family once he is discharged from the hospital to help with recovery and the grieving process.
  • Please share this page and event with anyone you know who knows Uriel, is an avid runner, or who would simply like to help with moral and emotion support to the Laras.

story:
What is RippedLinks?

Golf has a big problem. Over the last 10 years in the US alone, 20% of recreational golfers have stopped playing. That's over 5 million people! 18 to 36 year-olds aren't picking up the game and they certainly aren't watching the pros on TV.

The reasons are well documented. Millennials think golf is:

  • too slow 
  • too quiet
  • too conservative
  • too expensive 
  • too difficult to learn
  • and has way too many complicated rules

In other words, most young people think golf is lame. A game mostly played by retired people and millionaire tour professionals.

We are Philip Davis and Colin Weston, co-founders of RippedLinks. While watching sports in a Vancouver pub over two years ago, we asked ourselves, 

"Why can't golf be more like the X-Games?"

We love playing golf, but find it boring to watch. We also enjoy snowboarding, surfing and skateboarding, so the idea of combining elements from each of these sports comes naturally for us. So rather than complain about how underwhelming the golf viewing experience is, we decided to create something better.

With RippedLinks, we have created a competitive tour format that is fast, fun and loud, combining the energy and atmosphere of an action sport event with the best aspects of golf.

Our plan is to create a North American RippedLinks Tour to 4 to 6 cities, but first we need to stage a demonstration event to validate the concept to potential fans, investors, sponsors and broadcasters, while building our brand and creating buzz.

Imagine golf. Now have the players tee off from an elevated tower while DJs spin live music and our announcer calls the action. Drop in motorized longboard riding from the tower base to the green while a loud and excited crowd cheers the players on. THAT is RippedLinks.


What the press is saying about us...

Sports Illustrated/Golf.com January 2014 article "RippedLinks: Golf Gone Wild" http://www.golf.com/tour-and-news/golf-gone-wild-rippedlinks-combines-golf-and-extreme-sports-younger-audience

 

The April issues of Golf Canada and Chill magazines printed an article on RippedLinks titled "Golf Deconstructed". http://ow.ly/wAUEV

Back9Network article about our vision to create a golf format that appeals to a younger audience: http://www.back9network.com/article/xgames-and-golf-collide-with-rippedlinks/

How The Game Works

Nine young, elite level men and women will compete together in this debut extreme golf event in Vancouver, Canada. 

Three groups of three players will play a three-hole round, teeing off from the elevated tee box to a 110-yard, par 3 hole. Players then ride over to the green on motorized longboards, where they complete the hole while a 45 second shot clock counts down to keep the action moving.

Players return to the tee box to play the hole twice more to different pin locations on the green. If players are tied after their round, they go back to the tee for a dramatic one-shot, closest-to-the-pin decider. 

The three players with the lowest score after their 3-hole opening rounds will advance to the final round and play for the “RippedLinks Vancouver 2014 Champion” title.

Throughout game-play, DJ’s are spinning and the crowd is encouraged to cheer loud and hard for their favourite players. The game and player stats will be updated throughout the live event to ensure our audience is fully engaged in the RippedLinks experience.

This graphic shows how the 3 to 4 hour September 7th 2014 event will play out:

This Is Where YOU Come In.

We are holding our crowdfunding campaign to cover our event and video production costs, creating an experience that will test the critical game play and broadcast elements needed to tell our full story.

As a RippedLinks contributor, you'll be one of the authors of this story. 

We've received very positive feedback on our fully developed event concept and scalable business model from the golf, action sport, venture capital and broadcast industries, but they all ask us, 

"So how many events have you held so far?" 

Our answer of "none" is met with, "call us when you're holding an event!" 

So that's exactly what we are going to do in Vancouver BC on Sunday September 7, 2014.

With your help, we will stage a live event that creates the compelling video content and social buzz needed to make our concept a marketable sport property.

We invite you to join our journey to create a disruptively innovative golf format that appeals to a younger audience by clicking the "Contribute Now" button to the right!

So what's in it for YOU?

To show our gratitude for your support and generous contribution we're offering some exciting perks: From RippedLinks "LOUDER" signs, hats and t-shirts, to original artwork from our logo designer to VIP admission to our Vancouver event including a ride on a motorized longboard. There's something for everyone at various contribution levels!

RippedLinks stickers and limited edition poster signed by RippedLinks creators, Philip and Colin!

Our RIppedLinks "LOUDER" signs!

RippedLinks T-shirts!

RippedLinks Trucker Hats!

Original Artwork from our graphic artist Tony Ramsell.

Check out these perks and MORE in the list to the right and CONTRIBUTE TODAY to get in on some of the more exclusive experiences!

Gratitude & Other Ways You Can Help

We are extremely grateful for your contribution and support in making RippedLinks an epic event!

If you are unable to commit at this time, but you still want to see this FUN, LOUD and EXCITING event happen, please share this page with your friends through Facebook,Twitter and the social media links below. 

Thanks!  

Philip and Colin,
RippedLinks Co-founders

Who We Are

Philip Davis

Philip's love for surfing, snowboarding and golf provide the inspiration for creating the RippedLinks Tour. His design and implementation experience allow him to formulate dynamic solutions that enhance existing environments to create vibrant, memorable new spaces, buildings and facilities. With a proven sense for innovative design solutions and emerging trends, his project scope and typology ranges from cityscape and urban design, to community and campus planning, sports and recreation.

Leading teams to plan and deliver International Triathlon Union World Cup and World Championship events give Philip the experience to successfully execute the Vancouver RippedLinks Launch Event.

Through REVIVER Sport Entertainment, Philip applies his creative abilities to develop and deliver new sport formats. REVIVER enhances the viability of existing sports through sport properties and gameplay concepts that capitalize on emerging trends in participation and viewership. RippedLinks is a REVIVER live event and broadcast production.

Colin Weston 

As an architectural design professional, Colin has gained valuable experience leading and collaborating with high performance teams to design and deliver large, complex projects. His architectural experience spans mainly over three categories: Transit-Oriented Urban Design, Healthcare and Sport Architecture. This includes venue design for the Vancouver 2010 Olympic Games, and the Toronto 2015 Pan Am Games winning design submission for sport stadium and high performance athletic venues, event Fan Experience design and master planning.

This diverse experience, along with his love of action sports and golf has allowed Colin to develop a unique skill set that has naturally led to the co-founding of REVIVER Sport+Entertainment and its first sport product: RippedLinks.

Risks & Challenges

  • Our original venue design included a zipline from the tower to the green. However, due to budget constraints and construction logistics, we need to replace this feature with our players riding through the crowd from tee to green and back on motorized longboards. This is not a bad thing, as the longboard riding is nicely aligned with action sport culture and will provide spectacular visuals that are embedded in the gameplay. We still love the zipline idea, but are now saving that for a future RippedLinks event.
  • Creating something that has never been done before is an extremely challenging undertaking, but our business strategy to start small and build up as we go serves to reduce risk as much as one can with a startup. We embrace Eric Ries' "The Lean Startup" movement www.theleanstartup.com by creating a product (RippedLinks Vancouver), testing it, getting feedback, learning from the experience, then creating again (our next demo event). This "build-test-learn" cycle will give us the critical feedback we need from our fans and players, allowing us to refine and improve the RippedLinks experience with each successive event.

FAQ

  1. Q: Is this a family friendly event? 
    A: YES! We would love for you to bring your children to this event and get them excited about RippedLinks and the sport of golf!

  2. Q: What safety precautions are you taking with regards to golf balls flying over the crowd?
    A: As awesome as a RippedLinks competition event will be, fan and player safety is of primary importance to us. Although our players are elite level golfers, we realize they are human and may hit a bad shot from an elevated tee. We will have our fans positioned safely while our players hit their 100-120 yard long tee shots. During our course planning and design, we will determine if protective netting is required in strategic locations. Another important point is that we are not hitting 300 yard, 150 mph drives like on the PGA Tour. Our gameplay requires only high, lofted approach shots traveling at a fraction of the velocity generated with a driver.

  3. Q: Where can I buy tickets?
    A: Tickets will be available around August 1st. Stay tuned to the RippedLinks website and follow us on Twitter and Facebook for updates as to when tickets will be released and where to purchase them.

  4. Q: If I'm unable to contribute cash, how else can I help?
    A: If you're unable to contribute financially at this time but still want to help, please spread the word by sharing this page and our story with your friends and get them involved in this epic debut event! There are handy social media links provided below, or simply copy and past the link to this page into an email or to your Facebook page. We thank you for your support and enthusiasm! :)

  5. Q: Can I play?
    A: The RippedLinks Vancouver Event will have 9 competitors, 5 men and 4 women. They are elite level players (0 to 8 handicaps) between the age of 18 and 30 with a look, personality and an attitude that is less country club and more X Games. The good news for you is that we are still in the process of finalizing our player field and a couple of spots remain open. If you think you have what it takes to be a RippedLinks competitor, send us an "audition" video link and your brief golf/life story to info@rippedlinks.com. More player details are coming soon!
  6. Q: Please define "Priority", "Premium Fan Zone" and "VIP" admission. A: Contributors receiving "Priority" admission will have venue access two hours before the general public so they can be part of the pre-event experience. They receive "Front of the Line" entry privileges and also get exclusive access to the "Priority" viewing area located close to the green to take in all the gameplay action. Contributors receiving "Premium Fan Zone" admission receive all the "Priority" benefits plus exclusive viewing next to the players on the elevated tee box for one round of gameplay. Contributors receiving "VIP" admission get the "Premium Fan Zone" benefits plus private access to our "RL VIP House", where they get to hang out with players, event creators, commentators and DJs while enjoying our food and beverage catering.
story_txt:
What is RippedLinks? 
Golf has a big problem. Over the last 10 years in the US alone, 20% of recreational golfers have stopped playing. That's over 5 million people! 18 to 36 year-olds aren't picking up the game and they certainly aren't watching the pros on TV.The reasons are well documented. Millennials think golf is:
too slow 
too quiet

too conservative

too expensive 
too difficult to learn

and has way too many complicated rules
In other words, most young people think golf is lame. A game mostly played by retired people and millionaire tour professionals.We are Philip Davis and Colin Weston, co-founders of RippedLinks. While watching sports in a Vancouver pub over two years ago, we asked 
ourselves, "Why can't golf be more like the X-Games?" We
 love playing golf, but find it boring to watch. We also enjoy 
snowboarding, surfing and skateboarding, so the idea of combining 
elements from each of these sports comes naturally for us. So rather 
than complain about how underwhelming the golf viewing experience is, we
 decided to create something better.With RippedLinks, we have created a competitive tour format that is fast, fun and loud, combining the energy and atmosphere of an action sport event with the best aspects of golf.Our plan is to create a North American RippedLinks Tour to 4 to 6 cities, but first we need to stage a demonstration event to validate the concept to potential fans, investors, sponsors and broadcasters, while building our brand and creating buzz.Imagine golf. Now have the players tee off from an elevated tower while DJs spin live music and our announcer calls the action. Drop in motorized longboard riding from the tower base to the green while a loud and excited crowd cheers the players on. THAT is RippedLinks.What the press is saying about us...Sports Illustrated/Golf.com January 2014 article "RippedLinks: Golf Gone Wild"
http://www.golf.com/tour-and-news/golf-gone-wild-rippedlinks-combines-golf-and-extreme-sports-younger-audience
  The April issues of Golf Canada and Chill magazines printed an article on RippedLinks titled "Golf Deconstructed". http://ow.ly/wAUEV
Back9Network article about our vision to create a golf format that appeals to a younger audience: http://www.back9network.com/article/xgames-and-golf-collide-with-rippedlinks/
How The Game WorksNine young, elite level men and women will compete together in this debut extreme golf event in Vancouver, Canada. Three groups of three players will play a three-hole round, teeing off from the elevated tee box to a 110-yard, par 3 hole. Players then ride over to the green on motorized longboards, where they complete the hole while a 45 second shot clock counts down to keep the action moving.Players return to the tee box to play the hole twice more to different pin locations on the green. If players are tied after their round, they go back to the tee for a dramatic one-shot, closest-to-the-pin decider. The three players with the lowest score after their 3-hole opening rounds will advance to the final round and play for the “RippedLinks Vancouver 2014 Champion” title.Throughout game-play, DJ’s are spinning and the crowd is encouraged to cheer loud and hard for their favourite players. The game and player stats will be updated throughout the live event to ensure our audience is fully engaged in the RippedLinks experience.This graphic shows how the 3 to 4 hour September 7th 2014 event will play out:This Is Where YOU Come In. We are holding our crowdfunding campaign to cover our event and video production costs, creating an experience that will test the critical game play and broadcast elements needed to tell our full story.As a RippedLinks contributor, you'll be one of the authors of this story. We've received very positive feedback on our fully developed event concept and scalable business model from the golf, action sport, venture capital and broadcast industries, but they all ask us, "So how many events have you held so far?" Our answer of "none" is met with, "call us when you're holding an event!" So that's exactly what we are going to do in Vancouver BC on Sunday September 7, 2014.With your help, we will stage a live event that creates the compelling video content and social buzz needed to make our concept a marketable sport property.We invite you to join our journey to create a disruptively innovative golf format that appeals to a younger audience by clicking the "Contribute Now" button to the right!
So what's in it for YOU?
To show our gratitude for your support and generous contribution we're offering some exciting perks: From RippedLinks "LOUDER" signs, hats and t-shirts, to original artwork from our logo designer to VIP admission to our Vancouver event including a ride on a motorized longboard. There's something for everyone at various contribution levels!RippedLinks stickers and limited edition poster signed by RippedLinks creators, Philip and Colin!Our RIppedLinks "LOUDER" signs!RippedLinks T-shirts!RippedLinks Trucker Hats!Original Artwork from our graphic artist Tony Ramsell.Check out these perks and MORE in the list to the right and CONTRIBUTE TODAY to get in on some of the more exclusive experiences!Gratitude & Other Ways You Can HelpWe are extremely grateful for your contribution and support in making RippedLinks an epic event!If you are unable to commit at this time, but you still want to see this FUN, LOUD and EXCITING event happen, please share this page with your friends through Facebook,Twitter and the social media links below. Thanks!  Philip and Colin, RippedLinks Co-foundersWho We ArePhilip DavisPhilip's love for surfing, snowboarding and golf provide the inspiration for creating the RippedLinks Tour. His design and implementation experience allow him to formulate dynamic solutions that enhance existing environments to create vibrant, memorable new spaces, buildings and facilities. With a proven sense for innovative design solutions and emerging trends, his project scope and typology ranges from cityscape and urban design, to community and campus planning, sports and recreation.Leading teams to plan and deliver International Triathlon Union World Cup and World Championship events give Philip the experience to successfully execute the Vancouver RippedLinks Launch Event.Through REVIVER Sport Entertainment, Philip applies his creative abilities to develop and deliver new sport formats. story:
Hi!  My name is Devika. 

I'm a sophomore at Stanford studying product design engineering and building amazing products. My birthday is May 7th. It was supposed to be June 30th. 

Just like me, 1 in 10 babies born on this planet are premature. In a developed country like the US, I was able to survive and thrive with cutting edge neo-natal care. However, in developing countries, this is not true. Embrace is helping these premature and low-birth-weight babies to see the next day. 

Embrace is a "warmer in a box" for newborns. Premature and low weight babies need warmth to survive problems like neonatal hypothermia. A mechanism to access this warmth is not available readily in developing countries. The Embrace baby warmer is replacing unsafe alternatives like light-bulbs and hot water bottles in these regions. 

My team and I are running this campaign is to raise awareness and funds for neonatal education. Embrace is on a mission to create a community of empowered and educated healthcare workers working shoulder to shoulder with mothers to save babies in developing countries. 

Embrace will use funds from this campaign to design the best visual tools and methods for delivering information to the neonatal workers and mothers.  By the end of 2014, Embrace aims to reach 10,000 educators who will in turn reach over 150,000 low birth weight & premature infants around the world.

story:
What is Airoboom?

Airoboom is a smoking device designed to help people to smoke marijuana in an easier and healthier way. It uses water filter that is known to be the best filter to reduce the toxins we inhale while smoking.

The Airoboom was designed for easier smoking, so the whole smoking part is done by the device itself, so your lung doesn’t make an effort to burn the marijuana.
It is very smooth to inhale, yet very powerful.
We designed it from few different components so it will be easier to clean.each and one of the parts is easily replaceable.
It is easy for storing and for traveling, since it can be shorten to 8 Cm Height.
And It can contain 1 litre of concentrated THC air.

How does it work?

The Airoboom use simple physics.
The entire process of smoking is done by the vacuum that is created when you lift the Airopump upwards.
All you need to do, is fill up water in the bottom part. (It can be smoked without water, However it is highly recommended to use the water filter)
Put the Marijuana in the tube and burn it,
while you start to burn it, lift up the AiroPump slowly till the top.
Once the Airoboom is full with smoke, put your lips on the tube and press the AiroPump down.The smoke will run through the tube straight to your body.
The effect is very strong, and the inhaling is very smooth.

It’s a new kind of high, that only Airoboom can provide, its just feels better, cleaner.

The Airoboom is about a better experience of smoking and reducing the damage while smoking.


Why should you support us?

First of all, If you like to smoke marijuana, You MUST HAVE Airoboom!!

If you are not used to smoke, and need to use Marijuana for medical purposes, the Airoboom can help you consume THC with less toxins and effort.

There are many people who use medical marijuana in their daily life because they have cancer or other diseases and the marijuana helps them to reduce the pain and improve appetite.

Many of those people are non-smokers, yet the marijuana helps them in their sickness.

We believe Marijuana is a plant with a lot of benefits and healing powers, we are happy to see the legalization is starting to happen in many places, and hope other countries will follow and remove the bad reputation this plant has been given.

Our Perks

$10 – We appreciate your contribute THANK YOU!!

$50 – Get Airoboom Shirt

$125 – Get 1stEdition Airoboom (Choose your color)

$250 – Get Airboom Travelers Kit

$400 – Get Airoboom Before Launch, Be among the first 10 people to receive the Airoboom

$1100 – Get 10 Airboom Devices

$1000 – The persons who will donate for this perk, will receive Airoboom in a unique special design with their name inscribed with special thanks dedicated from the Airoboom team personally

$50,000 - Get 1000 Airoboom devices and be exclusive distributer in your area


Timeline and need

In order to make Airoboom alive, we need to raise at least $100,000 in order to produce the Airoboom (There is a minimum order quantity required of us)

When we will receive the full funding, we will let our manufacturer start working on the order.

Once done, we will ship the Airoboom to each and every one of the people who helped us out discreetly. (Estimated delivery time is August 2014)

Other Ways You Can Help:)

· Get the word out - share the video and campaign on facebook, twitter and amoung friends, family and colleagues.

· Use the indiegogo Share tools on this Campaign.

story:
What b pop! Is All About

Everyone needs a healthy breakfast to kick-start their day, so
we decided to create a nourishing food that was quick and easy, and in the form
of our favorite frozen treat.

b pop!s  are made with all natural, organic, whole foods. We are using the best ingredients to nourish and love your body from the inside out.  Because b pop!s are frozen, we don’t have to use any preservatives or filler ingredients. You’re only getting the nutrients you need that give you energy throughout the day, and none of the processed sugar and empty calories that leave you feeling drained. We’ve created 6 awesome flavors and have options that are paleo, vegan, raw, and nut free.

Who We Are

b pop! was started by three women who are passionate about making healthy, fast, and tasty choices available to the public. Our team has the knowledge and experience to successfully and strategically implement the growth of b pop! into a distributed product. With strong expertise in frozen food, marketing, and retail, our team consists of a vegan chef, a frozen food entrepreneur, and a branding and visual artist.  We are dedicated to making b pop! a household name.

                     Melissa                                  Tallent                                Victoria

Melissa is a retail brand designer and packaging/signage artist.  After spending 3 years as an artist and designer with Whole Foods Market, Melissa left so she could work with independent retail concepts and socially conscious businesses. Her passion for b pop! comes from a personal battle with an eating disorder and resulting desire to see people stop dieting and start eating nutritious, yummy food that they love.

Tallent studied International Business at Franklin University Switzerland, and while attending school she fell in love with the quality of European food. After graduation she returned stateside and started working in Marketing and Business Development for the next seven years before taking a leap to start her own small frozen foods company, RICCA. She's owned and operated RICCA, a gelato sandwich company for the past two years.

Victoria attended culinary school at Le Cordon Bleu in Austin and is classically trained. She started her career with Snap Kitchen. Her passion for vegan food began when she worked as a personal chef, providing nutritious and health centric meals for a vegan family. She then worked at Flow Juice Bar and helped to create their vegan choices and snacks. She left Flow to start b pop! and is the culinary force behind our 6 amazing flavors. She will begin studying holistic nutrition this fall.


What We Need

We need your help to get b pop! out into the world and into your hands! To make this possible, we need to invest in inventory, equipment, and marketing.  Until now we have used personal savings to fund the research and development of our popsicles and the working capital required for sales and minimal packaging.  However, we need a significant investment in inventory if we want to ramp up production and reach the shelves of grocery stores.  Our current inventory consists of the highest quality organic ingredients and packaging.  We need to invest in equipment in order to produce b pop!s in larger quantities.  This equipment includes an industrial food processor, a walk-in freezer for storage and point-of-sale freezers to distribute and show our product at retail locations. 


The Breakdown

We have used social media and farmers markets to promote our brand and establish our local presence. However, we need additional funding to get to the next level.  We bought and refurbished a vintage popsicle cart, or b-cycle, to promote our brand.  Our customers love it.  We plan to purchase two additional b-cycles to continue spreading the b pop! love.


Imagine these little boxes of happiness in a grocery store near you!


What You Get

We've come up with some super fun and interactive perks for investors that range from $5 to $5,000, so there should be something for everybody! From launch party invites to our three co-founders serenading you, to a group b pop! exercise class that's guaranteed to make you sweat! We can't wait to interact with our funders and meet you! 


How We Are Making An Impact

Our mission is to help build a better, tastier, healthier world one b pop! at a time. We’re not into dieting, but we are into nourishing our bodies with whole, organic ingredients.  We all lead fast paced lives in creative industries and felt that there had to be an innovative and quick breakfast snack that we could eat on the go. We wanted it to be healthy and leave us feeling energized, while being super tasty at the same time. That’s why we created b pop! We’ve made it simple for you and your whole family to lead a healthier life on the go with flavors everyone will love.

She will begin studying holistic nutrition this fall.What We Need
We need your help to get b pop! out into the world and into your
hands! To make this possible, we need to invest in inventory, equipment, and
marketing.  Until now we have used personal savings to fund the research
and development of our popsicles and the working capital required for sales and
minimal packaging.  However, we need a significant investment in inventory
if we want to ramp up production and reach the shelves of grocery stores. 
Our current inventory consists of the highest quality organic ingredients and
packaging.  We need to invest in equipment in order to produce b pop!s in
larger quantities.  This equipment includes an industrial food processor,
a walk-in freezer for storage and point-of-sale freezers to distribute and show
our product at retail locations. The Breakdown
 We have used social media and farmers markets to
promote our brand and establish our local presence. However, we need additional
funding to get to the next level.  We bought and refurbished a vintage
popsicle cart, or b-cycle, to promote our brand.  Our customers love it.  We plan to purchase two
additional b-cycles to continue spreading the b pop! love.Imagine these little boxes of happiness in a grocery store near you!What You Get
We've come up with some super fun and interactive
perks for investors that range from $5 to $5,000, so there should be something for
everybody! From launch party invites to our three co-founders serenading you,
to a group b pop! exercise class that's guaranteed to make you sweat! We can't wait to interact with our funders and meet you! 

How We Are Making An
Impact
Our mission is to help build a better, tastier, healthier
world one b pop! at a time. We’re not into dieting, but we are into nourishing
our bodies with whole, organic ingredients.  We all lead fast paced lives in creative industries and felt
that there had to be an innovative and quick breakfast snack that we could eat
on the go. We wanted it to be healthy and leave us feeling energized, while
being super tasty at the same time. That’s why we created b pop! We’ve made it
simple for you and your whole family to lead a healthier life on the go with
flavors everyone will love.

story:
Joey's Fund

Freedom Paws Assistance Dogs' Joey had to have emergency surgery on February 27, 2014 to remove 8 inches of his small intestines. Joey has recovered quickly, but Freedom Paws is currently trying to pay for his vet bills for his emergency surgery. 

  • Joey is a beautiful 15 month old black Labrador Retriever. He is on schedule to graduate as an assistance dog in the upcoming months. 
  • Joey loves swimming, playing fetch, and performing all of his job related tasks such as alerting, retrieving, pushing. Etc.


We Need to Raise $1,000 to cover the expenses of Joey's Emergency Surgery

  • Joey had to have multiple x-rays before surgery to diagnose and confirm need for surgery. He then had to spend several days in the hospital to be on fluids and recover.
  • We have several great perks to thank the people who donate to our campaign. If you donate $10 we will send you a personal thank you on both our facebook and twitter. If you donate $25 we will send you a personalized thank you card with Joey's picture and we will also thank you on facebook and twitter. Finally, if you donate $50 or more we will send you a personalized thank you card with Joey's picture and paw print, and a thank you on facebook and twitter. 
  • All of the funds will go towards Joey's emergency surgery fund even if we don't meet our full $1,000 goal.

The Impact

Freedom Paws Assistance Dogs is a 501c3 (pending) not for profit organization. Freedom Paws raises, trains, and places assistance dogs with people with physical, cognitive, and emotional disabilities. 

  • Since Freedom Paws is a not for profit when we have a huge expense like Joey's it really impacts our organization. 
  • Joey is back to himself and he is excited to continue his journey to becoming an assistance dog. 
  • Freedom Paws has placed several dogs with people with disabilities. These dogs are making incredible impact on those people's lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Spread the word about our campaign!!! Share it on your facebook page, twitter, etc.

story:
Sara, one of the kindest and most selfless people I know, is going through an extremely rough time, having to deal with what most of us dread - she is losing her mother, Nancy Filseth,  to terminal cancer.

On top of having to cover large co-pays for most medical expenses, she has to pay for her mother's hospice care that just doubled in daily cost, as hospice management determined her mother is not "dying fast enough" and  decided to double her daily occupancy cost to the amount of a four star hotel room. 

Sara is working multiple side jobs apart  from her full time job and still cannot cover all the  expenses. 

I cannot imagine how hard this must be for her and I want to do whatever I can to at least alleviate some of the financial burden. 

I hope you can help me help Sara!

Below you will find some perks for each donation amount. Feel free to donate your own desired amount, every little bit helps!
 If you cannot donate, please help spread the word!

All donations are going directly to Sara's bank account and will be used to cover the following:

  • hospice care costs
  • funeral costs
  • other medical and insurance costs

hospice care costs

other medical and insurance costs

story:
Water for your Body, Music for your Soul.

We've merged 2 essential aspects of life seamlessly into an elegant solution that integrates STUDIO GRADE audio into a state of the art rugged, smart water-bottle that's wirelessly controlled from your smartphone.  


Full Silicone Rubber

Tangle-Proof Robust and Resilient Design

High Current Capacity for Super-Fast Charging

Extended Cable Length 

Leatherette Cable Wallet Included!




What is Spritz? 

Spritz  is about incredible acoustics. It's a wireless music player that's designed and built with extremely advanced audio technology, then calibrated and tuned by a professional recording studio. 

It delivers an unparalleled sonic range with almost 95dB of loudness. That's as loud as a jackhammer at 50 ft !  

It can work wirelessly, streaming music from your smartphone, and comes with an app (iOS and Android versions) that fully controls SPRITZ.  Or you can also use it without your smartphone, as a stand alone MP3 player, using a standard microSD card to store and play up to 32GB of your music.  


But Spritz is also about personal healthcare. It provides you with the ability to carry essential drinking water (or any hydration fluid) for your active lifestyle, and is smart enough to REMIND you to STAY hydrated. All this in a rugged and robust bottle that's waterproof rated at IPX4  and durable enough to handle practically any activity, including active sports.  




How Will Spritz Benefit My Health?

It's so easy to get caught up in our everyday lives, that something as important as keeping our bodies well hydrated often slips our minds, and can even be damaging to our bodies. To tackle this problem, we've developed a system that can remind you as frequently (or not)as you like, to take a sip of water! 

Using the app, Spritz automatically pauses the music that's playing, to remind you to hydrate yourself at your desired time interval, using a gentle notification of your choice.





What does SPRITZ sound like?

SPRITZ  plays your music as though it's being played at a professional recording studio. The technology that makes this possible is world acclaimed, patented and rarely available in a consumer product.  It's called the BONGIOVI DIGITAL POWER STATION (DPS), and the difference is astounding, with enhanced clarity and depth creating a virtual sound stage that will blow you away. 


What is AUDIO REMASTERING?

Spritz incorporates BONGIOVI DPS which does Real Time Audio REMASTERING of music while it's streaming over Bluetooth. This patented algorithm understands that human ears pay the most attention to sounds to which they are most sensitive. 

No matter what the original content of the audio is, Bongiovi DPS will optimize the signal so that important sounds stay at a consistent volume without losing their emotional impact or causing unwanted artifacts.

The audio waveform below is for the song  New York, New York” 

by Tony Bennett and Frank Sinatra:

Notice the lighter blue core of the waveform surrounded by darker blue peaks. The light blue represents the average power of the audio and includes much of the information we perceive as loudness. The darker blue peaks can be much greater than the average power at any given moment. A normal audio system must work very hard to reproduce all of this information exactly as delivered.

The Bongiovi Digital Power Station™ Real Time Audio ReMastering™ process reacts instantly to the audio signal.  

Here is "New York, New York" processed by Bongiovi DPS:

Notice how the lighter blue is extremely consistent while the dark blue (still vibrant and active) is more controlled. It is easier for speakers to reproduce and it is easier for us to listen to. Even though this waveform appears quieter, you will perceive both examples to be the same volume. All of that space around the waveform is headroom that can be used to make the original recording much louder and clearer in a noisy environment. It's almost like the audio equivalent of HIGH DEFINITION TV, for your ears when listening to music.

This short video demonstrates the technology at work, enhancing a music file. Keep in mind that this video simulation uses the speakers in your computer or smartphone so it can't really do justice to the actual audio quality which Spritz can deliver, using the BONGIOVI DPS processing technology. 

The magic that drives this incredible technology actually comes from a long legacy of a man, a studio and dozens of the most talented artists that ever lived.

The man is Tony Bongiovi, who in 1977 built the world’s most famous recording studio: the Power Station. 

Due to its breakthrough acoustical design and engineering, the Power Station Studios in NYC became the facility of choice for artists including Madonna, Mariah Carey, Paul McCartney, Eric Clapton, Whitney Houston, Billy Joel, AC/DC, Bryan Adams, Aerosmith, The Beach Boys, Bon Jovi,  Miles Davis, Bob Dylan, Grateful Dead,  B.B. King,  Willie Nelson, The Rolling Stones, Bruce Springsteen, Sting, Barbara Streisand, Neil Young, and many more.

With years of experience creating some of the finest recordings in the world, Tony along with a highly talented team of engineers and sound designers created an incredible digital audio enhancement algorithm called BONGIOVI DPS which has the following capabilities:

  • Dynamic Range Control
  • Automatic Volume Control
  • Stereo Field Enhancement
  • Vocal Clarity Enhancement
  • Bass Enhancement
  • Sound Stage Enhancement
  • Ultra High Frequency (Air) Enhancement
  • Compressed audio (mp3, streaming, Bluetooth) restoration

It's so advanced, it actually even protects the speaker driver from damage during music playback, which lengthens it's lifespan significantly.


What's Inside?

Spritz has been designed with an incredible degree of engineering, in order to achieve a robust and reliable product that's waterproof, user-friendly and also acoustically optimised. As a prerequisite, SPRITZ  had to be MODULAR  for anyone to take apart/re-assemble, so that the bottle could be washed or even sterilised.  

But the construction had to be acoustically beneficial as well. We achieved all this and more, with what we call our Acoustic Turbine Architecture, which delivers a  360º field of sound dispersion, so that Spritz can face ANY direction, with no loss of sonic performance. Check out this video that explains the design:

In order to achieve an ultra wide frequency response, a traditional speaker box needs to incorporate 2 separate speaker drivers : the TWEETER and the WOOFER (for HIGH and LOW frequencies). But that takes a lot of space, and is impossible in a product the size and shape of SPRITZ. With this in mind, we engineered a solution that perfectly resolves the dilemma: the HYBRID SPEAKER. It's a combination of the 2 different types of speakers fused into one compact component. And it delivers! Crystal clear high frequency notes with sparkle and sharpness, with a bass response so powerful you can actually FEEL it in your hands. 

But what good is all that sound quality if you can't enjoy it for any reasonable length of time - like a minimum of 8-10 hours on a single charge?  That normally means a HUGE, HEAVY battery inside... something we did not want to burden our users with. So, we set out to achieve our goal in 2 ways: 

A. Power Efficient Circuit Design: 

We designed the Spritz PCB with a totally digital architecture using micro-components to consume the absolute MINIMUM energy when operating.

 

B. Advanced Lithium Battery Technology: 

Not all Rechargeable batteries are the same. SPRITZ uses an advanced Lithium Polymer cell (the same type as you'll find in the iPhone) which has one of the highest energy densities of all rechargeable batteries today. And the Spritz Lithium cell comes with an integrated safety circuit that prevents over-charging, over-loading and even under-voltage. This is extremely important not only because it extends the life of the battery itself, but even more so because it prevents internal cell damage which can sometimes lead to overheating of the battery. We've made no compromises, designing every aspect to ensure the highest standard of user safety. 

What about the Safety of the Bottle?

The Spritz bottle is designed using an amazing next generation copolyester material called  TRITAN™ made by the world famous technology giant EASTMAN. TRITAN™ is an impact resistant shatterproof tough plastic that has been approved for use in food and liquid/water contact applications by numerous regulatory agencies around the world, including:

  • U.S. FDA (Food & Drug Administration)
  • Health Canada
  • European Food Safety Authority and European Commission
  • China’s Ministry of Health
  • Japan Hygienic Olefin and Styrene Plastics Association
In particular,  TRITAN™ is BPA free. BPA stands for Bisphenol A which is an industrial chemical that is used to make certain plastics and resins since the 1960s. BPA is often used in containers that store food and beverages, such as water bottles.

Research has shown that BPA can seep into food or beverages from containers that are made with BPA. Exposure to BPA is a concern because of possible health effects of BPA on the brain, behavior and prostate gland of fetuses, infants and children. TRITAN™ is a BPA-free material — it is not manufactured with Bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenols, such as BPS.  Additionally, TRITAN™ has no estrogenic or androgenic hormonal activity. 

TRITAN™ also has exceptional dishwasher durability — so it encourages proper sanitation of the Spritz Water Bottle, for greater safety. 

Spritz will also comply with the European CE safety standard: RoHS  (Restriction of Hazardous Substances) which includes restrictions on the use of Lead, Mercury, Chromium-VI and Cadmium. A full series of chemical lab-testing to verify compliance will be conducted prior to mass production. 

What's included? 

Spritz will come in 2 kit versions: The WORKOUT, and the MARATHON.

The SPRITZ-WORKOUT kit includes:

1. The SpritzAudio Module, fully encased in Silicone Rubber protection                  with integrated Smart-Control keypad. This includes all the electronics, the hybrid speaker driver, the Micro-SD card reader, and the Lithium Cell + USB charging port. 

2. The Spritz Bottle in 400ml (13.2Oz) capacity.  BPA-Free,                 with Silicone Rubber Protection and  leakproof 'Grip-Loop'  Cap. 

3. Four Silicone SPRITZ Speaker Grill Rings (user changeable) in 4 colors:  Atomic-Green, Marine-Orange, Cool-Blue & Fuchsia-Pink

4. A Standard USB Charging Cable

5. The Spritz Carabiner - Anodised Aluminium, Spring-loaded, Rust-free, for attaching Spritz to your backpack, camping gear, keys, or even your belt-loop.             


The SPRITZ-MARATHON kit includes:

1. Fully encased in Silicone Rubber protection with integrated Smart-Control keypad. This includes all the electronics, the hybrid speaker driver, the Micro-SD card reader, and the Lithium Cell + USB charging port.

 2. TWO Spritz Bottles in 600ml (20.3oz) + 400ml (13.5oz) capacities.  BPA-Free, EACH with it's own custom Silicone Rubber Jacket and  leakproof 'Grip-Loop'  Cap.

3. Four Silicone Rubber SPRITZ Speaker Grill Rings (user changeable) in 4 colors:   Atomic-Green, Marine-Orange, Cool-Blue & Fuchsia-Pink

4. A Standard USB Charging Cable

                                         

5. The Spritz Carabiner - Anodised Aluminium, Spring-loaded, Rust-free, for attaching Spritz to your backpack, camping gear, keys, or even your belt-loop.                                         

                                       



Our Spritz Commitment, and Why

Having created and engineered more than 100 products in over 28 years, we have tons of experience in product development. And having worked on SPRITZ since almost 9 months, we have complete confidence in the delivery of this product. Combining all our experience as industry veterans with focus-group user feedback and tacit knowledge acquired during our months of research, we have focused on the things that matter, and engineered Spritz in meticulous detail covering every part of the process from industrial design to hardware and software development, and even to the precise manufacturing workflow. 

Spritz is already at working prototype stage, and we've built 6 fully functional samples for user testing and engineering evaluations including acoustic calibration and profiling - a key aspect of the Bongiovi DPS process.  

The tooling process of all the custom-made SPRITZ components will begin as soon as the indiegogo campaign has ended, in late November, and we expect all molds to be ready for production before December 31st 2015, so that we can start pilot (test) production in early January. 

Our key materials (PCB, Hybrid-Speaker, Lithium Battery, Silicone Jacket Casing, Blow-Moulded and Injection-Molded parts) can typically be delivered from our  component vendors (who we have already vetted thoroughly) within a 15 day turnaround and we have a solid relationship working directly with all our suppliers.  Therefore mass production can start by end-January 2016, and based on this, we have provided a conservative shipping date of February 2016 

We are excited that Spritz is finally at the stage where we can offer it to users who share our vision. We want to build a community of loyal SDigital  enthusiasts for life, and so our key goal is to reward you, as a backer with an incredibly cool, and truly useful product that you will love to use, and that lasts a lifetime. 


Contribution Rewards:



Project Timeline




Usage of Funds:



FAQ


Features:

Q.  What type of mobile devices will Spritz work with?

      A.  Spritz is compatible with a wide range of Bluetooth versions including 4.2, 4.1, 4.0, 3.0, and 2.1.  This covers the large majority of iOS and Android smartphones and tablets - practically every device built in the last 10 years, and even many Smart Watches that have Bluetooth!  Since it uses only the core profiles and protocols of Bluetooth, Spritz will also likely continue working with every new version, so you should be able to use Spritz with all your next generation devices. 

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  What is the capacity of the Spritz water bottle?

      A. The Spritz-Workout kit includes a bottle that holds 400ml (13.5oz). The Spritz-Marathon kit includes the 400ml size, and a second larger bottle, which holds 600ml (20.3oz). The two bottles are user interchangeable allowing for an aggregate capacity of over 1 Litre (33.8oz). Please select the appropriate perk. 

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q. How will Spritz improve my Hydration?

A. Included with the Spritz, is a 'HYDRATION ASSISTANT' app that reminds you to hydrate at any time interval of your choice. Once you set it, the app will pause your music at the appropriate time, and gently notify you so that you remember to take a drink and keep your body hydrated!

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Will the BONGIOVI Studio Enhancement work on all types of music and in different environments? Can I tweak how it sounds?

    A. Yes, BONGIOVI DPS will enhance all types of music. The digital processing 'opens up' the dynamic range of every kind of audio, even voice recordings. And you can select from several different profile settings, which BONGIOVI sound engineers create for different environments and listening preferences, so you have the ability to select your preferred settings for Spritz, or even for different types of music, or different places and conditions when/where you listen to music.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Is BONGIOVI just like an EQUALIZER? 

    A. No, BONGIOVI DPS isn't an Equalizer, although it includes sonic equalisation within it's processing. But that's just a small part of the story. Bongiovi provides REAL TIME RE-MASTERING of your music over Bluetooth, optimising it for the hardware and environment, making it much more vibrant and easy to listen to. Music is perceived to be much clearer and "open", and with an incredibly higher definition. 

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  What’s the wireless range of Spritz?

      A. Spritz has an unobstructed range of 10 meters (33 feet) from your smartphone when connected by Bluetooth. 

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Can I use Spritz without a Smartphone?

      A. Definitely! You can play up to 32GB of MP3 song files (each with a max resolution of up to 256 Kbps!) off your Micro-SD card.  Just plug it in to Spritz - it's as simple as that. 

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  How long does the Spritz take to charge?

      A. A full charge will take about 3 hours using a standard 1A USB charger, and an iPad (2.1A) USB charger will take just over an hour for a full charge.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  How long does a full charge last?

      A. A full charge will provide 8-10 hours of audio playback time (depending on the type of music and volume level).

ººººººººººººººººººººººº


Shipping:

Q.  When will Spritz start shipping?

      A.  Shipping will commence in February 2016.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  What is the cost of shipping?

      A. Shipping costs vary depending on your country, and will be added at checkout, based on your shipping destination and the perk[s] you have chosen.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q. Do you have distribution parterships available?

      A. Please email us at Global.Sales@SDigital.co if you have interest in becoming a distributor for Spritz and the rest of the SDigital line (Please visit www.SDigital.co)

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q. How many days after shipping, will I receive my perk?

      A. Shipping will take 1-2 weeks depending on your location.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q. Will I receive notification of shipping?

       A. Yes. You will be notified by email when your perk is shipped. 


Misc:

Q. I have more questions about SPRITZ and/or this campaign, who do I contact?

       A.  For any questions about SPRITZ and/or this campaign, you are more than welcome to email us at  Spritz@SDigital.co  we will try to answer all your questions as best we can.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Does Spritz come with tech support?

       A.  Absolutely. Just email us at Support@SDigital.co with any technical queries, we will be happy to help.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Where can I learn more about Sdigital?

      A. You can find out more about us and our mission on our website (www.sdigital.co) alternatively you can email us at Support@SDigital.co  for direct information about us.

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Who do I contact for investment opportunities?

     A. Please email us at Global.Sales@Sdigital.co

ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  What is the indiegogo campaign END date?

     A. The campaign will end on the 1st of December.


Legal Disclaimer: "Delivery and delivery-time of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts, and not guaranteed."
story_txt:

We've merged 2 essential aspects of life seamlessly into an elegant solution that integrates STUDIO GRADE audio into a state of the art rugged, smart water-bottle that's wirelessly controlled from your smartphone.  
Full Silicone Rubber
Tangle-Proof Robust and Resilient Design
High Current Capacity for Super-Fast Charging
Extended Cable Length 
Leatherette Cable Wallet Included!
