by Tony Bennett and Frank Sinatra:

Notice the lighter blue core of the waveform surrounded by darker blue peaks. The light blue represents the average power of the audio and includes much of the information we perceive as loudness. The darker blue peaks can be much greater than the average power at any given moment. A normal audio system must work very hard to reproduce all of this information exactly as delivered.
The Bongiovi Digital Power Station™ Real Time Audio ReMastering™ process reacts instantly to the audio signal.  
Here is "New York, New York" processed by Bongiovi DPS:
Notice how the lighter blue is extremely consistent while the dark blue (still vibrant and active) is more controlled. It is easier for speakers to reproduce and it is easier for us to listen to. Even though this waveform appears quieter, you will perceive both examples to be the same volume. All of that space around the waveform is headroom that can be used to make the original recording much louder and clearer in a noisy environment. It's almost like the audio equivalent of HIGH DEFINITION TV, for your ears when listening to music.This short video demonstrates the technology at work, enhancing a music file. Keep in mind that this video simulation uses the speakers in your computer or smartphone so it can't really do justice to the actual audio quality which Spritz can deliver, using the BONGIOVI DPS processing technology. 

The magic that drives this incredible technology actually comes from a long legacy of a man, a studio and dozens of the most talented artists that ever lived.



The man is Tony Bongiovi, who in 1977 built the world’s most famous recording studio: the Power Station. 

Due to its breakthrough acoustical design and engineering, the Power Station Studios in NYC became the facility of choice for artists including Madonna, Mariah Carey, Paul McCartney, Eric Clapton, Whitney Houston, Billy Joel, AC/DC, Bryan Adams, Aerosmith, The Beach Boys, Bon Jovi,  Miles Davis, Bob Dylan, Grateful Dead,  B.B. King,  Willie Nelson, The Rolling Stones, Bruce Springsteen, Sting, Barbara Streisand, Neil Young, and many more.

With years of experience creating some of the finest recordings in the world, Tony along with a highly talented team of engineers and sound designers created an incredible digital audio enhancement algorithm called BONGIOVI DPS which has the following capabilities:

Dynamic Range Control
Automatic Volume Control
Stereo Field Enhancement
Vocal Clarity Enhancement
Bass Enhancement
Sound Stage Enhancement
Ultra High Frequency (Air) Enhancement
Compressed audio (mp3, streaming, Bluetooth) restoration


It's so advanced, it actually even protects the speaker driver from damage during music playback, which lengthens it's lifespan significantly.
What's Inside?
Spritz has been designed with an incredible degree of engineering, in order to achieve a robust and reliable product that's waterproof, user-friendly and also acoustically optimised. As a prerequisite, SPRITZ  had to be MODULAR  for anyone to take apart/re-assemble, so that the bottle could be washed or even sterilised.  


But the construction had to be acoustically beneficial as well. We achieved all this and more, with what we call our Acoustic Turbine Architecture, which delivers a  360º field of sound dispersion, so that Spritz can face ANY direction, with no loss of sonic performance. Check out this video that explains the design:

In order to achieve an ultra wide frequency response, a traditional speaker box needs to incorporate 2 separate speaker drivers : the TWEETER and the WOOFER (for HIGH and LOW frequencies). But that takes a lot of space, and is impossible in a product the size and shape of SPRITZ. With this in mind, we engineered a solution that perfectly resolves the dilemma: the HYBRID SPEAKER. It's a combination of the 2 different types of speakers fused into one compact component. And it delivers! Crystal clear high frequency notes with sparkle and sharpness, with a bass response so powerful you can actually FEEL it in your hands. But what good is all that sound quality if you can't enjoy it for any reasonable length of time - like a minimum of 8-10 hours on a single charge?  That normally means a HUGE, HEAVY battery inside... something we did not want to burden our users with. So, we set out to achieve our goal in 2 ways: A. Power Efficient Circuit Design: 
We designed the Spritz PCB with a totally digital architecture using micro-components to consume the absolute MINIMUM energy when operating.
 B. Advanced Lithium Battery Technology: Not all Rechargeable batteries are the same. SPRITZ uses an advanced Lithium Polymer cell (the same type as you'll find in the iPhone) which has one of the highest energy densities of all rechargeable batteries today. And the Spritz Lithium cell comes with an integrated safety circuit that prevents over-charging, over-loading and even under-voltage. This is extremely important not only because it extends the life of the battery itself, but even more so because it prevents internal cell damage which can sometimes lead to overheating of the battery. We've made no compromises, designing every aspect to ensure the highest standard of user safety. 
What about the Safety of the Bottle?

The Spritz bottle is designed using an amazing next generation copolyester material called  TRITAN™ made by the world famous technology giant EASTMAN. TRITAN™ is an impact resistant shatterproof tough plastic that has been approved for use in food and liquid/water contact applications by numerous regulatory agencies around the world, including:



U.S. FDA (Food & Drug Administration)
Health Canada


European Food Safety Authority and European Commission

China’s Ministry of Health

Japan Hygienic Olefin and Styrene Plastics Association

In particular,  TRITAN™ is BPA free. BPA stands for Bisphenol A which is an industrial chemical that is used to make certain plastics and resins since the 1960s. BPA is often used in containers that store food and beverages, such as water bottles.
Research has shown that BPA can seep into food or beverages from containers that are made with BPA. Exposure to BPA is a concern because of possible health effects of BPA on the brain, behavior and prostate gland of fetuses, infants and children. TRITAN™ is a BPA-free material — it is not manufactured with Bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenols, such as BPS.  Additionally, TRITAN™ has no estrogenic or androgenic hormonal activity. 
TRITAN™ also has exceptional dishwasher durability — so it encourages proper sanitation of the Spritz Water Bottle, for greater safety. 
Spritz will also comply with the European CE safety standard: RoHS  (Restriction of Hazardous Substances) which includes restrictions on the use of Lead, Mercury, Chromium-VI and Cadmium. A full series of chemical lab-testing to verify compliance will be conducted prior to mass production. 

What's included? 
Spritz will come in 2 kit versions: The WORKOUT, and the MARATHON.

The SPRITZ-WORKOUT kit includes:
1. The SpritzAudio Module, fully encased in Silicone Rubber protection                  with integrated Smart-Control keypad. This includes all the electronics, the hybrid speaker driver, the Micro-SD card reader, and the Lithium Cell + USB charging port. 

2. The Spritz Bottle in 400ml (13.2Oz) capacity.  BPA-Free,                 with Silicone Rubber Protection and  leakproof 'Grip-Loop'  Cap. 
3. Four Silicone SPRITZ Speaker Grill Rings (user changeable) in 4 colors:  Atomic-Green, Marine-Orange, Cool-Blue & Fuchsia-Pink
4. A Standard USB Charging Cable

5. The Spritz Carabiner - Anodised Aluminium, Spring-loaded, Rust-free, for attaching Spritz to your backpack, camping gear, keys, or even your belt-loop.             




The SPRITZ-MARATHON kit includes:

1. Fully encased in Silicone Rubber protection with integrated Smart-Control keypad. This includes all the electronics, the hybrid speaker driver, the Micro-SD card reader, and the Lithium Cell + USB charging port.


 2. TWO Spritz Bottles in 600ml (20.3oz) + 400ml (13.5oz) capacities.  BPA-Free, EACH with it's own custom Silicone Rubber Jacket and  leakproof 'Grip-Loop'  Cap.
3. Four Silicone Rubber SPRITZ Speaker Grill Rings (user changeable) in 4 colors:   Atomic-Green, Marine-Orange, Cool-Blue & Fuchsia-Pink



4. A Standard USB Charging Cable
                                         5. The Spritz Carabiner - Anodised Aluminium, Spring-loaded, Rust-free, for attaching Spritz to your backpack, camping gear, keys, or even your belt-loop.                                                                                










Our Spritz Commitment, and Why

Having created and engineered more than 100 products in over 28 years, we have tons of experience in product development. And having worked on SPRITZ since almost 9 months, we have complete confidence in the delivery of this product. Combining all our experience as industry veterans with focus-group user feedback and tacit knowledge acquired during our months of research, we have focused on the things that matter, and engineered Spritz in meticulous detail covering every part of the process from industrial design to hardware and software development, and even to the precise manufacturing workflow. 
Spritz is already at working prototype stage, and we've built 6 fully functional samples for user testing and engineering evaluations including acoustic calibration and profiling - a key aspect of the Bongiovi DPS process.  
The tooling process of all the custom-made SPRITZ components will begin as soon as the indiegogo campaign has ended, in late November, and we expect all molds to be ready for production before December 31st 2015, so that we can start pilot (test) production in early January. 
Our key materials (PCB, Hybrid-Speaker, Lithium Battery, Silicone Jacket Casing, Blow-Moulded and Injection-Molded parts) can typically be delivered from our  component vendors (who we have already vetted thoroughly) within a 15 day turnaround and we have a solid relationship working directly with all our suppliers.  Therefore mass production can start by end-January 2016, and based on this, we have provided a conservative shipping date of February 2016 
We are excited that Spritz is finally at the stage where we can offer it to users who share our vision. We want to build a community of loyal SDigital  enthusiasts for life, and so our key goal is to reward you, as a backer with an incredibly cool, and truly useful product that you will love to use, and that lasts a lifetime. 



Contribution Rewards:







Project Timeline











Usage of Funds:






FAQ


Features:
Q.  What type of mobile devices will Spritz work with?
      A.  Spritz is compatible with a wide range of Bluetooth versions including 4.2, 4.1, 4.0, 3.0, and 2.1.  This covers the large majority of iOS and Android smartphones and tablets - practically every device built in the last 10 years, and even many Smart Watches that have Bluetooth!  Since it uses only the core profiles and protocols of Bluetooth, Spritz will also likely continue working with every new version, so you should be able to use Spritz with all your next generation devices. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  What is the capacity of the Spritz water bottle?
      A. The Spritz-Workout kit includes a bottle that holds 400ml (13.5oz). The Spritz-Marathon kit includes the 400ml size, and a second larger bottle, which holds 600ml (20.3oz). The two bottles are user interchangeable allowing for an aggregate capacity of over 1 Litre (33.8oz). Please select the appropriate perk. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q. How will Spritz improve my Hydration?
A. Included with the Spritz, is a 'HYDRATION ASSISTANT' app that reminds you to hydrate at any time interval of your choice. Once you set it, the app will pause your music at the appropriate time, and gently notify you so that you remember to take a drink and keep your body hydrated!ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Will the BONGIOVI Studio Enhancement work on all types of music and in different environments? Can I tweak how it sounds?
    A. Yes, BONGIOVI DPS will enhance all types of music. The digital processing 'opens up' the dynamic range of every kind of audio, even voice recordings. And you can select from several different profile settings, which BONGIOVI sound engineers create for different environments and listening preferences, so you have the ability to select your preferred settings for Spritz, or even for different types of music, or different places and conditions when/where you listen to music.
ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  Is BONGIOVI just like an EQUALIZER? 
    A. No, BONGIOVI DPS isn't an Equalizer, although it includes sonic equalisation within it's processing. But that's just a small part of the story. Bongiovi provides REAL TIME RE-MASTERING of your music over Bluetooth, optimising it for the hardware and environment, making it much more vibrant and easy to listen to. Music is perceived to be much clearer and "open", and with an incredibly higher definition. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  What’s the wireless range of Spritz?
      A. Spritz has an unobstructed range of 10 meters (33 feet) from your smartphone when connected by Bluetooth. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  Can I use Spritz without a Smartphone?
      A. Definitely! You can play up to 32GB of MP3 song files (each with a max resolution of up to 256 Kbps!) off your Micro-SD card.  Just plug it in to Spritz - it's as simple as that. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº

Q.  How long does the Spritz take to charge?
      A. A full charge will take about 3 hours using a standard 1A USB charger, and an iPad (2.1A) USB charger will take just over an hour for a full charge.
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  How long does a full charge last?
      A. A full charge will provide 8-10 hours of audio playback time (depending on the type of music and volume level).
ººººººººººººººººººººººº



Shipping:
Q.  When will Spritz start
shipping?
      A.  Shipping will commence in February 2016. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  What is the cost of shipping?
      A. Shipping costs vary depending on your country, and will be added
at checkout, based on your shipping destination and the perk[s] you have
chosen.
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q. Do you have distribution
parterships available?
      A. Please email us at Global.Sales@SDigital.co if you have
interest in becoming a distributor for Spritz and the rest of the SDigital line
(Please visit www.SDigital.co)
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q. How many days after shipping,
will I receive my perk?
      A. Shipping will take 1-2 weeks
depending on your location. 
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q. Will I receive notification of
shipping?
       A. Yes. You will be notified by
email when your perk is shipped. 

Misc:

Q. I have more questions about SPRITZ and/or this campaign, who do I contact?
       A.  For any questions about SPRITZ and/or this campaign, you are more than welcome to email us at  Spritz@SDigital.co  we will try to answer all your questions as best we can.
ºººººººººººººººººººººººQ.  Does Spritz come with tech support?

       A.  Absolutely.
Just email us at Support@SDigital.co
with any technical queries, we will be happy to help.
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  Where can I learn more about Sdigital?
      A. You can find out more about us and our mission on our website (www.sdigital.co) alternatively you can email us at Support@SDigital.co  for direct information about us.
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  Who do I contact for investment opportunities?
     A. Please
email us at Global.Sales@Sdigital.co
ººººººººººººººººººººººº
Q.  What is the indiegogo campaign END date?
     A. The
campaign will end on the 1st of December.

Legal Disclaimer: "Delivery and delivery-time of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts, and not guaranteed."

story:
This is Elif. Correction: I should have said, this was Elif, four months ago, prior to his diagnosis with leukemia cancer. Elif only lives with her mother.  Her mother went to cleaning the house , makes a living by deleting the stairs. The mother does not have a regular income. 15,000 TL(5000$ - dollar 3 x5000) needed for the child to be treated. Please spare your help . His mother 's desperate situation. So please, even if it's only what you consider to be a small amount, do contribute to this cause. Every donation will make a difference. You will have my eternal gratitude, as well as that of Elif and his mother Aynur. And on a date to be confirmed you will also have pictures of me with a bald head. And that's got to be worth paying for.  

Thanks so much for your support.

Furkan.

story:
Version Française!

ANTIDOTE 02 from Corpa Flora, the benefits of retinoids without the irritation or the sensitivity to sunlight

Introduction

Céline Champigny, the founder of Corpa Flora, has worked over 20 years in Academic Research Laboratories before establishing her company specializing in the development of topical lipid complexes that nourishes the skin. These lipid complexes go beyond conventional beauty products and combine both cosmetics and skin nutrition. The major advantage of our lipid formulas is that they can penetrate the epidermis (where most conventional beauty creams cannot go) and strengthen the skin’s natural lipid barrier by providing the cells with essential fatty acids that the body cannot produce (Omega 3 and 6). Omegas 3,5,6,7 and 9 are also found in Corpa Flora’s lipid complexes.


Prizes and Distinctions

Corpa Flora won the Grand Prize for Best Innovation from the Canadian Beauty Group in 2014 for its camellia BEAUTÉ DIVINE which has distinguished itself in the Canadian market as a cleansing oil comparable to Shu Uemura but without mineral oil or petrochemical derivatives. BEAUTÉ DIVINE as also won the Best Facial Cleanser Prize from CLEAN CARE in 2015.


The versatility of Corpa Flora’s ANTIDOTES

Towards the end of 2014, Corpa Flora introduced its first ANTIDOTE 01 Firming “Botox effect” in the Canadian market, a lipid complex containing omega 3,6,7 and 9 as well as a trademark plant extract from Acmella Spylanthes (also known as Gatuline In-Tense). This extract has Lifting and Firming activity that can reduce facial expression lines up to 50%. The goal of our ANTIDOTE line is to conquer the market of dermo-aesthetic clinics looking to offer their clients a more natural alternative skin care line that is as effective and less toxic. It can also be used in conjunction with other existing lines and treatments such as Botox and Hyaluronic acid injections. Our lipid ANTIDOTE’s can be used alone or can be blended 50/50 with other facial creams or water-based serums to increase their nourishing effects.

Corpa Flora in Vogue magazine 

Our Award Winner Camellia Cleansing oil    

"Beauté Divine" would  be in the April issue of VOGUE magazine 

in the "Raw Beauty Segment".

Thank you VOGUE !


Retinoid side effects

The retinoid family is composed of synthetic and natural derivatives of vitamin A. Certain retinoids require a medical prescription (adapalene, tazarotene, tretinoin) and are generally used in the treatment of acne. There is substantial scientific evidence that demonstrates that retinoids are not only beneficial in acne treatment but they are also effective as an anti-aging treatment. Skin care products containing retinoids (retinol, retinaldehyde,  retinyl propionate, retinol palmitate) are available without prescriptions but these are much less effective. If you decide to try one of these retinoid skincare products, be aware that you may have secondary effects such as redness, irritations and greater sensitivity to sunlight and should not be used on sensitive skin types.

Corpa Flora’s Challenge

Corpa Flora is currently completing the formulation of 2 new ANTIDOTE complexes, ANTIDOTE 02 “Retinol Effect” and ANTIDOTE 03 “anti-redness”.  ANTIDOTE 02 contains a natural trademark molecule that has the same properties as retinoids but without the secondary effects. It will work on all skin types, including sensitive skin and can also be used during the day since it is not photosensitive. THE ADVANTAGES OF RETINOIC ACID WITHOUT IRRITATION AND SUNLIGHT SENSITIVITY.

ANTIDOTE 03 contains several anti-inflammatory ingredients including a trademark oil extract from the Caper floral bud, also known as Gatuline derma-sensitive. This lipid complex will act on the inflammatory response in order to soothe reactive and sensitive skins as well as light to moderate rosacea which is difficult to control without the use of corticosteroids.

We are looking to raise $20,000.00 for the purchase of trademark ingredients as well as pay the costs associated with the design of labels, packaging and publicity flyers for our ANTIDOTE 02 and ANTIDOTE 03.

Corpa Flora and the Competition

We distinguish ourselves from the competition by providing our signature “New Generation” lipid complexes that can be used alone or in combination with other creams or water-based serums. We are formulating what clinics are currently demanding and we use molecules of natural origin that have been clinically tested and are non-irritating to the skin. We believe that our lipid complexes will contribute to improving skin health without the use of potentially toxic or chemical ingredients (We are part of Environment Defence against toxic ingredients in cosmetics and also Cruelty FREE). We offer effective green cosmetics that work in synergy with the epidermis (lipophilic nature) and contain essential fatty acids (Omega 3,5,6,7 and 9) that truly nourish the skin. Our formulas do not contain any water and are composed of 100% bioactive ingredients. 



français

Les bienfaits des rétinoïdes sans l’irritation et la sensibilité au soleil

avec ANTIDOTE 02 de Corpa Flora


INTRODUCTION

Céline Champigny, fondatrice de la compagnie Corpa Flora, a travaillé plus de 20 ans dans les laboratoires de recherche académique avant de donner vie à son entreprise spécialisée dans la fabrication de complexes lipidiques topiques pour une nutrition cutanée qui và au-delà des produits de beauté conventionnels. Ces sérums lipidiques 0% d'eau se situent entre la nutrition et la cosmétique. L'avantage de nos formules lipidiques est qu'elles peuvent pénétrer l'épiderme et renforcer labarrière lipidique cutanée ( là ou ne vont pas les crèmes de beauté conventionnelles) et également nourrir les membranes cellulaires en leur apportant de bons acides gras essentiels que le corps ne peut pas synthétiser (Oméga 3 et 6).Nous retrouvons les Oméga 3 5 6 7 et 9 à l'intérieur des formules Corpa Flora.


Prix et distinctions

Corpa Flora a reçu le Grand Prix de l'Innovation du Canadian Beauty Group avec son huile nettoyante à la camélia BEAUTÉ DIVINE et s'est distingué sur le marché canadien avec un produit nettoyant comparable à la ligne de Shu Uemura mais sans huile minérale ou dérivés pétrochimiques. La même huile nettoyante a également reçu le Prix du Meilleur Nettoyant Facial  CLEAN CARE en mars 2015.


La versatilité des ANTIDOTES de Corpa Flora  

 Corpa Flora a déjà mis sur le marché canadien fin 2014 son tout premier ANTIDOTE 01 FERMETÉ à "effet-botox", un complexe lipidique ou on y retrouve les Oméga 3 6 7 et 9 et qui contient également un extrait de plante breveté (Acmella Spylanthes ou connu sous le nom de Gatuline In-Tense) qui possède un effet phyto-tenseur qui réduit les rides d'expression jusqu'à 50% et qui ne contient aucune toxine. Le but  de cette ligne ANTIDOTE est de conquérir le marché des cliniques dermo-esthétiques qui recherchent des soins plus naturels à offrir à leur clientèle mais qui peuvent également servir de soins topiques complémentaires aux lignes déjà existantes et aux injections de botox et d'acide hyaluronique. Si la peau est en santé, l'effet des traitements subséquents sera amélioré. Les ANTIDOTES s'utilisent seuls mais peuvent être mélangés 50/50 avec n'importe quel crèmes ou sérums aqueux.

Corpa Flora dans VOGUE !

Nous sommes très heureux de vous faire part que l'huile nettoyante BEAUTÉ DIVINE de CORPA FLORA sera dans le magazine international VOGUE du mois d'AVRIL dans la section Beauté Naturelle.


Problématique des Rétinoïdes

Les rétinoïdes comprennent les dérivés naturels et synthétiques de la vitamine A. Certains rétinoïdes exigent une prescription médicale (adapalène, tazarotène, trétinoïne) et ils sont généralement employés dans le traitement de l’acné. Il existe une évidence scientifique substantielle démontrant les bienfaits des rétinoïdes pour l’acné et comme anti-âge. On peut acheter sans prescription des produits pour la peau qui contiennent des rétinoïdes (rétinol, rétinaldéhyde, propionate de rétinyl, palmitate de rétinyl) mais leur efficacité est réduite. Si vous décidez d’essayer un produit à base de rétinoïdes, attendez-vous à quelques effets secondaires courants tels que de la rougeur, de l’irritation et une plus grande sensibilité au soleil.  .

Défis de CORPA FLORA

Corpa Flora formule présentement 2 antidotes, dont l'ANTIDOTE 02 à "effet-rétinol" qui renferme une molécule brevetée naturelle ayant les même propriétés que les rétinoïdes mais sans les effets secondaires, donc un complexe qui pourra être utilisée par tous les types de peaux, incluant les peaux sensibles et qui pourra également être utilisé le jour car il ne sera pas photosensible. LES BIENFAITS DE L'ACIDE RÉTINOÏQUE MAIS SANS l'effet irritant et la photo-sensibilité.

L'ANTIDOTE 03 aura un "effet anti-rougeur" qui renfermera plusieurs ingrédients anti-inflammatoires dont un extrait huileux breveté qui provient des bourgeons floraux du câpre  ou connu sous le nom de Gatuline derma-sensitive qui agira sur la réponse inflammatoire afin d'apaiser les peaux réactives et très sensibles, incluant également la rosacée qui est difficile à contrôler sans les corticostéroïdes.

Nous recherchons $20 000.00 afin d'acheter nos molécules naturelles brevetées et également nous aider à défrayer les coûts associés au "design" des étiquettes, boites et feuillets publicitaires de ANTIDOTE 02 et ANTIDOTE 03.

Corpa Flora et la compétiton

Nous nous démarquons en ce moment sur le marché canadien avec une signature de complexes lipidiques (huiles faciales "Nouvelle Génération") qui peuvent être utilisés seuls mais aussi mélangés à n'importe quel crème ou sérum aqueux. Nous formulons ce que les cliniques recherchent et nous sommes à  l'affût des nouvelles molécules d'origine naturelle qui sont testées cliniquement et qui ont un indice d'irritation cutané très bàs et pratiquement nul.

Nous croyons que nos formules pourront contribuer à améliorer la santé cutanée sans ingrédients potentiellement toxiques et chimiques, nous nous dirigeons vers une cosmétique saine, verte et véritablement nutritive en synergie avec l'épiderme qui laisse pénétrer les substances lipidiques ( huiles ou acides gras), nous ne fabriquons pas de crèmes ou de sérums à base d'eau, nos formules sont 100% bioactives..

retinoids without the irritation or the sensitivity to sunlight

Céline Champigny,
the founder of Corpa Flora, has worked over 20 years in Academic Research

topical lipid complexes that nourishes the skin. These lipid complexes go

skin’s natural lipid barrier by providing the cells with essential fatty acids
that the body cannot produce (Omega 3 and 6). Omegas 3,5,6,7 and 9 are also
found in Corpa Flora’s lipid complexes.



Prizes and Distinctions

Corpa Flora won the
Grand Prize for Best Innovation from the Canadian Beauty Group in 2014 for its
camellia BEAUTÉ DIVINE which has distinguished itself in the Canadian market as
a cleansing oil comparable to Shu Uemura but without mineral oil or
petrochemical derivatives. BEAUTÉ DIVINE as also won the Best Facial Cleanser
Prize from CLEAN CARE in 2015. 



The versatility of Corpa Flora’s ANTIDOTES
Towards
the end of 2014, Corpa Flora introduced its first ANTIDOTE 01 Firming “Botox
effect” in the Canadian market, a lipid complex containing omega 3,6,7 and 9 as
well as a trademark plant extract from Acmella Spylanthes (also known as
Gatuline In-Tense). This extract has Lifting and Firming activity that can
reduce facial expression lines up to 50%. The goal of our ANTIDOTE line is to
conquer the market of dermo-aesthetic clinics looking to offer their clients a
more natural alternative skin care line that is as effective and less toxic. It
can also be used in conjunction with other existing lines and treatments such
as Botox and Hyaluronic acid injections. Our lipid ANTIDOTE’s can be used
alone or can be blended 50/50 with other facial creams or water-based serums to
increase their nourishing effects.


Corpa Flora in Vogue magazine 

Our Award Winner Camellia Cleansing oil    
"Beauté Divine" would  be in the April issue of VOGUE magazine 
in the "Raw Beauty Segment".
Thank you VOGUE !


Retinoid side effects

The
retinoid family is composed of synthetic and natural derivatives of vitamin A.
Certain retinoids require a medical prescription (adapalene, tazarotene,
tretinoin) and are generally used in the treatment of acne. There is
substantial scientific evidence that demonstrates that retinoids are not only
beneficial in acne treatment but they are also effective as an anti-aging
treatment. Skin care products containing retinoids (retinol, retinaldehyde,  retinyl propionate, retinol palmitate)
are available without prescriptions but these are much less effective. If you
decide to try one of these retinoid skincare products, be aware that you may
have secondary effects such as redness, irritations and greater sensitivity to
sunlight and should not be used on sensitive skin types.
Corpa Flora’s Challenge

Corpa
Flora is currently completing the formulation of 2 new ANTIDOTE complexes,
ANTIDOTE 02 “Retinol Effect” and ANTIDOTE 03 “anti-redness”.  ANTIDOTE 02 contains a natural trademark
molecule that has the same properties as retinoids but without the secondary
effects. It will work on all skin types, including sensitive skin and can also
be used during the day since it is not photosensitive. THE ADVANTAGES OF
RETINOIC ACID WITHOUT IRRITATION AND SUNLIGHT SENSITIVITY.
ANTIDOTE
03 contains several anti-inflammatory ingredients including a trademark oil
extract from the Caper floral bud, also known as Gatuline derma-sensitive. This
lipid complex will act on the inflammatory response in order to soothe reactive
and sensitive skins as well as light to moderate rosacea which is difficult to
control without the use of corticosteroids.
We are
looking to raise $20,000.00 for the purchase of trademark ingredients as well
as pay the costs associated with the design of labels, packaging and publicity
flyers for our ANTIDOTE 02 and ANTIDOTE 03.

Corpa Flora and the Competition

We
distinguish ourselves from the competition by providing our signature “New
Generation” lipid complexes that can be used alone or in combination with other
creams or water-based serums. We are formulating what clinics are currently
demanding and we use molecules of natural origin that have been clinically
tested and are non-irritating to the skin. We believe that our lipid complexes
will contribute to improving skin health without the use of potentially toxic
or chemical ingredients (We are part of Environment Defence against toxic
ingredients in cosmetics and also Cruelty FREE). We offer effective green
cosmetics that work in synergy with the epidermis (lipophilic nature) and
contain essential fatty acids (Omega 3,5,6,7 and 9) that
truly nourish the skin. Our formulas do not contain any water and are composed
of 100% bioactive ingredients. 





français

Les bienfaits des rétinoïdes sans l’irritation et la sensibilité au soleil
avec ANTIDOTE 02 de Corpa Flora

INTRODUCTION
Céline Champigny, fondatrice de la
compagnie Corpa Flora, a travaillé plus de 20 ans dans les laboratoires de
recherche académique avant de donner vie à son entreprise spécialisée dans la
fabrication de complexes lipidiques topiques pour une nutrition cutanée qui và
au-delà des produits de beauté conventionnels. Ces sérums lipidiques 0% d'eau
se situent entre la nutrition et la cosmétique. L'avantage de nos formules
lipidiques est qu'elles peuvent pénétrer l'épiderme et renforcer labarrière
lipidique cutanée ( là ou ne vont pas les crèmes de beauté conventionnelles) et
également nourrir les membranes cellulaires en leur apportant de bons acides
gras essentiels que le corps ne peut pas synthétiser (Oméga 3 et 6).Nous
retrouvons les Oméga 3 5 6 7 et 9 à l'intérieur des formules Corpa Flora.



Prix et distinctions
Corpa Flora a reçu le Grand Prix de
l'Innovation du Canadian Beauty Group avec son huile nettoyante à la camélia
BEAUTÉ DIVINE et s'est distingué sur le marché canadien avec un produit
nettoyant comparable à la ligne de Shu Uemura mais sans huile minérale ou
dérivés pétrochimiques. La même huile nettoyante a également reçu le Prix du
Meilleur Nettoyant Facial  CLEAN CARE en mars 2015.



La versatilité des ANTIDOTES de Corpa Flora  
 Corpa Flora a déjà mis sur le
marché canadien fin 2014 son tout premier ANTIDOTE 01 FERMETÉ à
"effet-botox", un complexe lipidique ou on y retrouve les Oméga 3 6 7
et 9 et qui contient également un extrait de plante breveté (Acmella Spylanthes
ou connu sous le nom de Gatuline In-Tense) qui possède un effet phyto-tenseur
qui réduit les rides d'expression jusqu'à 50% et qui ne contient aucune toxine.
Le but  de cette ligne ANTIDOTE est de conquérir le marché des cliniques
dermo-esthétiques qui recherchent des soins plus naturels à offrir à leur
clientèle mais qui peuvent également servir de soins topiques complémentaires
aux lignes déjà existantes et aux injections de botox et d'acide hyaluronique. Si la peau est en santé, l'effet des traitements subséquents sera amélioré. Les ANTIDOTES s'utilisent seuls mais peuvent être mélangés 50/50 avec n'importe
quel crèmes ou sérums aqueux.

Corpa Flora dans VOGUE !
Nous sommes très heureux de vous faire part que l'huile nettoyante BEAUTÉ DIVINE de CORPA FLORA sera dans le magazine international VOGUE du mois d'AVRIL dans la section Beauté Naturelle.



Problématique des Rétinoïdes
Les rétinoïdes comprennent les dérivés
naturels et synthétiques de la vitamine A. Certains rétinoïdes exigent une
prescription médicale (adapalène, tazarotène, trétinoïne) et ils sont
généralement employés dans le traitement de l’acné. Il existe une évidence
scientifique substantielle démontrant les bienfaits des rétinoïdes pour l’acné
et comme anti-âge. On peut acheter sans prescription des produits pour la peau
qui contiennent des rétinoïdes (rétinol, rétinaldéhyde, propionate de rétinyl,
palmitate de rétinyl) mais leur efficacité est réduite. Si vous décidez
d’essayer un produit à base de rétinoïdes, attendez-vous à quelques effets
secondaires courants tels que de la rougeur, de l’irritation et une plus grande
sensibilité au soleil.  .
Défis de CORPA FLORA
Corpa Flora formule présentement 2
antidotes, dont l'ANTIDOTE 02 à "effet-rétinol" qui renferme une
molécule brevetée naturelle ayant les même propriétés que les rétinoïdes mais
sans les effets secondaires, donc un complexe qui pourra être utilisée par tous
les types de peaux, incluant les peaux sensibles et qui pourra également être
utilisé le jour car il ne sera pas photosensible. LES BIENFAITS DE L'ACIDE
RÉTINOÏQUE MAIS SANS l'effet irritant et la photo-sensibilité.
L'ANTIDOTE 03 aura un "effet
anti-rougeur" qui renfermera plusieurs ingrédients anti-inflammatoires
dont un extrait huileux breveté qui provient des bourgeons floraux du câpre
 ou connu sous le nom de Gatuline derma-sensitive qui agira sur la réponse
inflammatoire afin d'apaiser les peaux réactives et très sensibles, incluant
également la rosacée qui est difficile à contrôler sans les corticostéroïdes.
Nous recherchons $20 000.00 afin
d'acheter nos molécules naturelles brevetées et également nous aider à défrayer
les coûts associés au "design" des étiquettes, boites et feuillets
publicitaires de ANTIDOTE 02 et ANTIDOTE 03.
Corpa Flora et la compétiton
Nous nous démarquons en ce moment sur
le marché canadien avec une signature de complexes lipidiques (huiles faciales
"Nouvelle Génération") qui peuvent être utilisés seuls mais aussi
mélangés à n'importe quel crème ou sérum aqueux. Nous formulons ce que les
cliniques recherchent et nous sommes à  l'affût des nouvelles molécules
d'origine naturelle qui sont testées cliniquement et qui ont un indice
d'irritation cutané très bàs et pratiquement nul.
Nous croyons que nos formules
pourront contribuer à améliorer la santé cutanée sans ingrédients
potentiellement toxiques et chimiques, nous nous dirigeons vers une cosmétique
saine, verte et véritablement nutritive en synergie avec l'épiderme qui laisse
pénétrer les substances lipidiques ( huiles ou acides gras), nous ne fabriquons
pas de crèmes ou de sérums à base d'eau, nos formules sont 100% bioactives..

story:
If you've talked to me in the past few months, you probably know that I'm in a strange situation. I woke up one day with my head in a fog and a numb left arm. Since the middle of May, my head has felt like a pressure cooker. I feel disassociated from my body and surroundings, which has caused much anxiety and frustration. Every step feels like I'm walking on cushions, which is, well, unsettling. After many doctor visits and negative test results, it's still a mystery. I'm dealing with it mentally and making progress, but am now in a pretty big $lump and need some love. Hospital bills, specialists, lab tests and 6+ weeks off of work have collectively sucked my life away financially. If you can help me get back on the Tucson summer love train, I'll never forget it.

Note: The goal of $4000 takes into account the amount of work I've missed, two visits to the ER, seeing an ear/nose/throat specialist, a neurologist, and now regularly seeing a somatic practitioner and a naturopathic doctor. I don't want to put it on you all to pay for my healthcare, but any donation amount would help greatly with recovery.

Thank your for even considering to contribute!

-Mike

story:
Hi everyone, my name is Norman,

I am a disabled ex-serviceman and very determined to be able to sustain my family with fresh, organic fruit and vegetables using my ducks as the main source of nutrients.  After this I would like to expand further to supply small markets and a percentage going to charities to feed those people who need a little help with fresh healthy products .

My background consists of a 20 year career in the Royal Navy seeing service in the Falklands in 1982, Gulf War in 1991 and with the United Nations in Cambodia 1993 earning me the M.B.E. 

After my service I had a very hard time getting used to a civilian life, but eventually retraining as a computer engineer and getting back on my feet and loving life.

This came to an abrupt end a few years ago and I have now found myself looking for a different way of life and one which is more home grown. 

 I spent a lot of time this year volunteering at http://bioaquafarm.co.uk/ in Somerset

where Rainbow Trout are used as a source of nutrients to feed and grow fantastic food, I also learned far more than any course could have done and more importantly how to build a sustainable system (a big thank you to Antonio for all the info, wonderful lunches and stories)


So what is DuckPonics?

DuckPonics is a circulation of duck waste (duck poo) from the pond and pumped into floating veg beds where the roots hang free in the water.  The roots take up the nutrients, which in turn treats the water, the water then flows back to the duck pond.  This system uses 95% less than traditional horticulture farming.

The ducks are fed organic feed pellets as well as having a free run of the garden; which in turn clears the garden of most slugs and snails and to my amazement has kept the lawn at a nice height thus stopping me from using my petrol lawnmower.

The only messy part of this system is cleaning the duck house on a regular basis, however the hay which is also full of duck poo makes for fantastic compost.

 

We are currently in rented accommodation near Bristol and with the kind permission of my landlord,  I have successfully established a happy brood of 6 ducks, a small Duck Pond  (thanks for the back breaking work Dad :-), and a  4x4 meter poly tunnel.

The timber for the poly tunnel came from broken pallets at a local company Richard Austin Alloys http://www.raaltd.com/ who donated all the wood and thus keeping the costs to a minimum.  I would like to add a special thank you to Camy (Manager) & Jason (Assistant Manager) who helped with the big bits that I couldn’t carry and ensured I had enough to build the poly tunnel.

Also with the wood I was able to build the Duck House

and two media beds which are now growing the first crop of Lettuce, Cabbage and beetroot. 

As the months progress I will be adding Wild Strawberries, a host of herbs and just about anything else that can fit in and grow happily.




That is the trial stage just about to end and now the next stage is to get this system working on a larger scale, get a small profit going and start donating to those who need a helping hand to have access to fresh organic healthy fruit and veg.

This is where your help is most wanted.  We need a property with approximately 1/4 acre of land to make this possible.  We already have 60% of the funds but the last 40% is proving to be difficult and it’s the last 40% which will get the piece of land big enough to have a free range area for the ducks during the day, a decent pond to do what comes naturally to ducks and finally the poly tunnels with different media beds for the food to grow.  As before, the timber I can get for free and the rest of the materials I can source, beg, steal and borrow and in general take time to build up this project.


So, my Crowd Funding friends – what can I do to entice you to help me get all my ducks in a row?

Obviously for each £1 donated you will receive a personal message of thanks and I will make a regular post of our progress to date.

£50 won’t get you 50 messages, but at least the offer of a visit to have a look around and a free lunch made from the produce.  As an additional bonus, my wife is Chinese and has readily agreed to cook some authentic Chinese dishes for our guests - did I mention she is a fantastic cook.

A couple of hours of volunteer work will also be rewarded with a free lunch and huge thank you for your helping hands because you did the difficult bits that I am unable to do on my own.

Additional Prize – everyone who donates just £5 will be entered into a draw and picked at random after the campaign has completed. The winner will be invited to visit us for the day, have a Duck adopted in their name (or a name of their choice) and a personalised Tee shirt made to mark the occasion.

Please look at the other rewards and choose whatever makes you feel happy. 

Remember, you are under no obligation to donate to my cause, but I would kindly ask you to please post this on your  Facebook  page and Tweet about it,  Email to all of your friends, collegues and even your local barber who's email is in your contacts by useing the Indiegogo share tools!


Thank you and wish me luck!

Please note: it has come to my attention that when people want to donate, they see the paypal name of Weiling Huang and are put off.  Weiling is my wife and we are using her account as I don't have one.


Thank you again.

story:
This holiday season, are you looking for an opportunity to give a gift with special meaning?  Give the Gift of Good Health to someone in recovery by supporting our free Herbal Medicine Clinic!   Touch the lives of others, and honor a loved one at the same time.

The People’s Medicine Clinic is an herbal health clinic that supports the people in  recovery through wellness.   We work with people in recovery from substance abuse, trauma, and in stressful situations and/or experiencing financial hardship as they step into their new lives.  We offer comprehensive health consultations, and work with each individual to make recommendations for integrating herbs, foods, and simple practices into their daily routines.  We offer unlimited follow up and on-going care, communication, and support.  We are raising money to support what has, up until now, been a completely volunteer labor of love/out-of-pocket expense.

The People’s Medicine Clinic started with an herb garden, in the early spring of 2013.  A group of local herbalists planted 4 community garden plots with medicinal herbs, with the vision of “making plant medicine more accessible to all people.”  We wanted to be a vehicle through which all people could find a connection to health and healing, specifically those disempowered by the conventional health care system, or just sick, discouraged, and broke. 

Here’s how we are bridging access to wellness:

  • We help people feel better.  Clients feel supported by our practitioners who spend time, listen, offer recommendations, and follow up. Feeling well has had rippling effects on people’s lives; bringing inspiration and a renewed sense of possibility. 


  • Clients see our practitioners FREE OF CHARGE.  All appointments, including follow-ups and additional communications, are included in the free care.  We then provide free (or in some cases, at cost) herbs, supplements, food, recipes, and information.  


  • We do targeted outreach. We prioritize serving people who would not otherwise be able to afford alternative health care.  We do extensive outreach and networking with community service agencies. 


  • We work collaboratively.  We are in partnership with the Recover Project and the Recovery Learning Center, sister organizations in Greenfield that provide resources for people in recovery from substance abuse and mental illness. The clinic is housed at their space, and we maintain a close connection to their membership and staff. 


  • We offer free programs and herbs to the whole community.  We maintain a community medicine garden where we host free workshops, and invite the community to help and harvest.  As much as possible, the clinic uses herbs harvested from the medicine garden.


  • We are grassroots.  We are thrilled that one of our first clients has now become our clinic manager, and has a leadership role in the functioning of the clinic.  Other clients, in gratitude, are beginning to offer what time and resources they have as well.


  • We encourage community support.  Practitioners of other modalities of complementary medicine (massage, cranio sacral therapy) are inspired by our work, and are beginning to offer their services through the clinic as well.  We would like to grow our community engagement in the clinic and the garden, and welcome your gifts of time, money or talent. 


  • We consider the whole picture.  The People’s Medicine Clinic is indirectly involved in Franklin County’s Opiate Task Force, which was started to address the heroin/opiate problem in the county.


Your contribution will help achieve our goals for 2015 by paying for:

  • The community garden plot fee, seeds, and supplies.


  • Herbal medicines.  (A two-month supply costs about $50/client.)


  • Outreach materials and informational hand-outs for clients.


  • Workshop supplies.


  • Education and training for our volunteer clinic manager.


  • Expanding clinic hours in 2015 to accommodate demand.

story:
I need to pay the fees of an aggressive attorney that will GIVE me justice as a victim by suffering due to the crime my husband committed.

i am disabled and can't make enough to support my son and i alone and do not have retainer fees,

i need judgement holding him financially accountable so that i can start life.

i am not getting fair share of his high income, bits and pieces. still not enough for bills.

my case is very strong, i just need help to hire someone.

i have been tortured long enough, my son and i deserve a peaceful positive life.

thank you for reading
story_txt: I need to pay the fees of an aggressive attorney that will GIVE me justice as a victim by suffering due to the crime my husband committed.i am disabled and can't make enough to support my son and i alone and do not have retainer fees, i need judgement holding him financially accountable so that i can start life.i am not getting fair share of his high income, bits and pieces. still not enough for bills. my case is very strong, i just need help to hire someone.i have been tortured long enough, my son and i deserve a peaceful positive life.thank you for reading

story:
My friend Susan is in need of emergency dental surgery. All 4 quadrants of her mouth are infected/abscessed and if not treated soon could turn fatal.
On a limited income with SSI, Medi-Cal is not approving the treatment, and even low income dentists are demanding at least $1,800 down to start the process. 
Everything helps.

story:
Short Summary

Hi there! Welcome to our fundraising page!

I would like to begin by introducing myself. My name is Jennifer Corter, and I am a 24 year old stay-at-home mom. I am the creator of this fundraising campaign, which aims to raise funds to help my stepfather, Dan pay his medical bills and medications. Dan is an incredible man, someone I look up to, and aim to be as strong as someday. He came into our lives seven years ago, moving from Massachusetts just to be with my mother, someone who he calls his soul-mate. Since then, he has provided us with a loving home and lasting memories. We hope to create many more memories for years to come.

In July of 2013, his journey with cancer began, though at that time we did not know that it was cancer. It started innocently enough, when he began not being able to keep food down. But due to not having any medical insurance whatsoever and always putting others first, he did not seek medical attention. It was not until November that same year when he began seeing blood that he sought medical help. An endoscopy was done and it was found out that he has esophageal cancer.

Since November, our lives have been turned upside down, he has been in the hospital more than once due to dehydration and not being able to eat or drink. There is no way that he can work in the condition that he is in, which means he has no real insurance to speak of. He was granted 80% charity care at our local hospital, but that does not cover medications, and 80% still leaves us with a great deal of bills. We are turning to crowd-funding to try and help raise the funds needed for his medical bills, medications and operations that are ahead of him. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The money raised from this campaign will go directly to paying for Dan's medical bills he has accrued since being diagnosed with cancer, and any leftover money will go right to paying for the medications he needs. 
  • We are taking a unique approach to our fundraising campaign. Many of our friends and family members have been donating some of their beautiful handmade creations as "perks" for the donations that we receive. We are very excited to be offering a wide variety of rewards and perks for your donations! From jewelry to handmade cards, hair bows, blankets, hats, we're a regular little ol' handmade market over here! 
  • Even a small amount helps, each dollar counts!

The Impact

I cannot begin to tell you how much everyone who has donated means to us. Each and every one of you are incredible people. We are incredibly grateful for all of you. Any funds raised will help immensely for our family, to be able to soften the blow of the medical expenses accrued due to Dan's cancer. We are eternally grateful to everyone, for your donations, your shares, your kind words, they all truly mean the world to us. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to get the word out about our campaign, please feel free to do so! Every share and view counts!

  • Do you Facebook or Twitter? Please share our campaign with your friends, fans and followers! We will be eternally grateful! You can use the handy Indiegogo share tools over at the top of the page here! 
  • Busy blogger? Please consider sharing our campaign with your followers! You can contact me directly for more information if you would like to write a blog post about our campaign at JLynnCorter@yahoo.com!

story:
From Discovery to  Production:

Hi, I am Jessica Filkins - I’m a yoga teacher, health coach and entrepreneur. During my studies at the Institutive of Integrative Nutrition, I was shocked to learn that chronic inflammation contributes to 7 out of 10 deaths in the United States. Chronic Inflammation is the underlying cause of heat disease, obesity, diabetes, dementia, depression, cancer, rheumatoid arthritis, and even autism. I realized there is a dire need to reduce inflammation through diet and natural medicine. I learned that turmeric and ginger are two of the most powerful anti-inflammatory spices in the world. 

Prior to studying at the Institute of Integrative Nutrition, I suffered from inflammation for four years and I was diagnosed with IBS. I tried numerous cures ranging from extreme diets and supplements to bizarre therapies, but none of them completely healed my stomach.

Two years ago, while traveling in Indonesia, I discovered Jamu - their medicinal elixir, that many Indonesians drink on daily basis. This bright yellow liquid tasted like a bitter version of a spicy chai latte. Drinking Jamu on a regular basis drastically reduced my inflammation and soothed my stomach. I learned how to make Jamu, which contains primarily turmeric and ginger as well as several other varying ingredients.

                         

Once I returned to the United States feeling healthy and happy, I wanted to share my discovery of Jamu with everyone who could benefit from its anti-inflammatory properties. I made my own version of it and shared it with my father and grandmother, who claim it reduced their arthritic symptoms.

I shared samples of my Jamu Juice with my co-workers at the local food Co-Op in Wakefield, Rhode Island. They loved the beverage and my boss asked if I would make it for them to sell. The Co-Op’s customers also loved Jamu Juice so much that I could hardly keep up with the demand. Everyone wanted the recipe but no one wanted to make it at home because it involved washing, peeling, grating, mixing and blending nearly two dozen ingredients. 

The medicinal effects of the spices in Jamu Juice are more pronounced when the beverage is consumed on a regular basis. Therefore,  I needed to find a way for people to easily make this delicious anti-inflammatory beverage at home. After many weeks of experimentation, I finally developed an instant turmeric-ginger chai tea mix, which I call Liquid Sunshine! Each scoop of this powdered spice mix contains ten powerful, anti-inflammatory spices.

I sold this instant tea powder at famers markets in Rhode Island throughout the summer and fall and received amazing amounts of positive feedback from my customers. It is now flying off the shelves at several local health food stores and cafes.  My goal is to scale up production so that more people can enjoy the positive health effects of this tea and reduced inflammation. 

                     
For a more detailed explanation of my discovery of Jamu, my journey to health and the development of this company please visit www.JamuJuice.com.
                             

Here is what other some of my customers have to say about Jamu Juice:


For a more detailed description of Jamu juice from discovery to production please visit the website.

  

I need your help to make this anti-inflammatory tea available to more people in the future. Your generous donations will make this dream a reality!   

          

The Perks

You will be rewarded for every dollar you donate with a variety of perks some of which far exceed the value of your donation. The perks range from packets of Jamu Tea to private health coaching to an all inclusive yoga retreat in the Bahamas!

About Jessica

I am a yoga teacher, health coach and entrepreneur. I love learning, surfing, cooking, traveling and meeting new people. I grew up on Block Island, a tiny island of the coast of Rhode Island. I graduated from Colorado College where I studied philosophy, psychology, and anthropology. I became very ill my senior year of college. My journey to health ended up being a four year process of self-discovery and a wonderful introduction the field of alternative medicine and nutrition.  Despite my illness, I co-founded a nonprofit art program for Haitian immigrant children in the Bahamas. I spent my summers on Block Island driving a launch boat, saving up money for my dream trip to Indonesia. Little did I know that this solo surf and yoga adventure around the would lead to my discovery of Jamu- the key to my healing and the beginning of a new career.


          


Risks & Challenges

Starting this business has not been easy, but I have learned a lot during the process. Despite the fact that, in its current form, I do not need any special equipment to make and package the tea, at a small scale, nor am I cooking or processing anything, the Department of Health still requires that all food products be produced in a certified kitchen. The Alternative Food Co-Op in Wakefield, RI has allowed me to use a tiny section of their small kitchen during the evening hours to make my tea provided I continue to make the liquid version of the chai tea for them on a bi-weekly basis. Luckily, I already had my food safety certification, but I also needed to get a license for my fledgling business. The wholesale/retail food-processing permit from the Department of Health took 3+ months to process and cost $500.  

Now that I have more customers buying online and more stores selling my tea, I need a bigger space to blend and package the spices. I have to store all of my ingredients and equipment at the production facility, but the Alternative Food Co-Op barely has enough space for their own materials. 

Right now I am only able to produce in small batches. I need to devise a more efficient package method with more durable and professional labels. This campaign will provide the funding to bridge the gap from order by order production to having inventory. This will enable me to focus on other aspects of the business, including research and development of new products.

 In the short term, I am planning to rent my own adequate kitchen space. When it becomes economically prudent, I may subcontract out some parts of my business such as the blending and packaging to a co-packing company rather than invest in large expensive machinery and a permanent facility. At this point, it is critical that  I scale up production so that I can develop a relationship with a distribution company as it is not feasible for a small company to distribute packets of tea. 

There is a culinary business incubator called Hope and Main that recently opened in Pawtucket, RI. This fall, I met with the director about using one of their kitchens to make my tea.  It seems to be a perfect fit for expanding Jamu Juice PBC. It will cost about $700 to apply and use their kitchen and then $25 per hour after that. With a new space, I will have to reapply for a license through the Department of Health which will cost another $500. Soon it will be necessary to hire employees to increase productivity. 

Now that I have incorporated as a Public Health Corporation, my goal is to have millions of people all over America, and eventually around the world, enjoying the health benefits of this tea. The more stores and cafes that carry it, the more accessible the tea will be to the people who need it.  

While the powdered tea is popular and perfect for the winter, my customers at the Alternative Food Co-Op rave about the cold liquid version, which was the original version we sold. The liquid version is a truly unique product as there are no dairy-free iced chai teas on the market- especially none with turmeric! If this campaign raises more than $10,000, I will be able to work with a bottling facility to make this creamy, healthy, chai tea available to big name distributors such as UNFI.

Budgeting my time and resources to bootstrap this business has been a great challenge- even spending the time to prepare this campaign was a calculated decision. But with the possibility of bridging the gap from order by order production to mass distribution, I have decided to ask for your help. Any contributions you make- be it advice, feedback, or monetary blessings- will be greatly appreciated and wisely incorporated into my business. 

             


Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with your friends and family! You can email it or share it on Facebook and other social media sites. For easy sharing, use the Indiegogo share tools!

Another way you can help is to become a distributor of Jamu Juice! For more details contact me at jessfilkins@gmail.com or visit the affiliate page at www.JamuJuice.com. Helping to distribute this tea will provide you with some extra income and a way to help others in need of natural anti-inflammatory solutions.

story:
All life forms, regardless of their nature, require two elements to ensure their survival: air and water; however, in the last 10 years water has become a scarce commodity and, given the growing demand generated by the increase in population, major industrial demands and climate change, it has strongly impact the global population that leave waterless areas, affecting the health and quality of life of millions people.


We believe that we can make a difference in this world if we get every home located in isolated areas the possibility of generating an unlimited amount of high quality drinking water to meet their subsistence needs, avoiding dependence on large logistic chains for continuous supply.



Therefore, we’ve developed a technological alternative for obtaining Purified Water from the Air, a good that is available to each of the inhabitants of this planet. Our proposal is to enhance the Air, which is an inexhaustible well, as a social resource that can be exploited for water production.

We are a group of professionals, engineers, industrial designers and experts in water, which we have joined there selves to enable millions of people free worldwide access to water at a fair price; with this goal we’ve developed FreshWater, a solution that combines technology and a social good.






FreshWater has become a rapid deployment, easy use and simply maintenance  solution, which under a simple operation enables you to get high quality water with no sodium, no chlorine, no fluoride, no heavy minerals, without chemicals or preservatives ensuring the care and health of millions of children.

This self-sustaining solar powered solution allows, by leveraging the relative humidity, get between 9 and 30 liters of Purified Water to meet the needs of families living in communities lacking of this element.



Our commitment is, in a first step, to meet the needs of Latin America and the Caribbean, where more than 34 million people do not have access to clean water. We want to start with the delivery of the first 1000 units, so that in the future will be 10,000, 100,000 or why not 1,000,000 units distributed around the planet, calming global thirst.

The Future is here!....We're FreshWater, help us to help people around the World!!

Help us raise the necessary funds to develop the platform to produce this social technology innovation to deliver drinkable water to all households that do not have this vital resource ... Help us to democratize this alternative and renewable source of water .... Her contribution and support is important in achieving this goal! ...




FreshWater is a 100 startups chosen to be part of Generation 12...They believed in us! ... But this is not enough! ... The goal is for all ... help us to help!

http://www.startupchile.org/ladies-and-gentleman-these-are-the-100-startups-chosen-to-be-part-of-generation-12/

story:
Thank you everyone that has contributed to our campaign, shared it or even took the time to learn about The Flying Carpet!

We will start teaching yoga classes in Madrid in March, and begin filming videos to put in our app.

For a class schedule, or information on when our app goes live, please visit:

theflyingcarpet.es

If you want to contact us, you can email us at info@theflyingcarpet.es

Talk to us us Twiiter anytime: _flyingcarpet

Thank you and we look forward to meeting you live or online!

The Flying Carpet


The Flying Carpet yoga app: The world is your yoga studio. Visit it anytime anywhere via mobile app.

   


A note from the founder, Mary Clare... 

Too busy for yoga? Not anymore.

While running a yoga studio on the Upper East Side of Manhattan, I found my client's schedules were so jam-packed that they could practice yoga only once or twice a month. Some clients joked that I should stream live classes so they could easily take them at home, at work, or while traveling. As an extensive world traveler and certified yoga teacher, that was a lightbulb moment. I set an intention for 2015: launch The Flying Carpet app! 

I've said goodbye to the Big Apple and moved permanently to Madrid where I will film yoga classes and stream them live as well as offer them on-demand via mobile app. The Flying Carpet mobile app will also feature downloadable classes like "Yoga Reboot" and "Jet Lag Rx" to help frequent travelers get their minds and bodies back on track. We'll take our "flying carpet" around the world to film classes in beautiful and inspiring locales -- we already have an Ibiza beach class and a Spanish garden class in the works. On deck is a traditional asana class from India, the ancient birthplace of India. Classes at The Flying Carpet never take place in your typical sterile yoga studio!



Whether you're suffering from wanderlust or traveler's fatigue, The Flying Carpet mobile app is for you -- it's made for yogis and travelers of all kinds. I can't bring this global yoga sanctuary to life without your help. I've found unique spaces to film from in Madrid and around the world but I need your help raising funds to pay for the production of the videos and the creation of the mobile app. We recently changed our funding goals- we now are targeting $13,00. It's not reflected in our target amount because Indiegogo won't let us change our final amount. So please keep that $13,000 in mind and read on to learn more about our business plan and to see some "rough draft" classes. 

Namaste,

Mary Clare

A Sanctuary for Global Travelers

30,000 Foot View: Why do we call our yoga studio The Flying Carpet? Because it's the first yoga studio you can take with you – and yoga used to be practiced on small carpets before the invention of the modern yoga mat. With The Flying Carpet mobile app, you can take your favorite class live from anywhere around the world – or whenever you want.

The Flying Carpet helps travelers find balance, cure jet lag and traveler’s fatigue, and take classes on the go. Here’s what you’ll find on The Flying Carpet mobile app: 

·  On-Demand MP3s and Instructional Videos: Our yoga classes, deep breathing exercises, and mindfulness techniques are available for immediate download and can be practiced anywhere in the world.



·  Classes from featured locations around the world: Yoga travel is the new armchair travel! Our app will continue to feature new classes from exciting, exotic locations around the world. Examples: Enjoy a sunset vinyasa class on the beach in Ibiza, or a traditional asana class from a beautiful Indian garden in Jaipur. We'll feature a different location every month, and even include some fun travel tips for those locations.


·  Jet Lag Cures for Global Travelers: We’ll offer in-person and downloadable classes that help travelers "phase shift" before jet travel and "phase adjust" upon arrival, as well as calming exercises that alleviate jet lag. Here's a "rough draft" of the Jet Lag Rx class you can try. If you like it, please donate so we can make more with better production technology than Mary Clare's ipad and Windows Moviemaker:



·  Exercises to Reduce Flight Anxiety: Our app recommends specifically-designed breathing exercises and mindfulness techniques that help traveler’s brains produce anxiety- alleviating chemicals. When you relax on the plane, you’ll feel great upon arrival.


·  Immersion Technology Research and Product Development: Our long-term goal is to be the first yoga studio to offer a full immersion experience. You’ll be able to book an aromatherapy massage after practicing under the guidance of an Indian Yoga Master, and receive both services anywhere in the world. A true "Sanctuary on Your Schedule."

The Flying Carpet Team


Founder- Mary Clare Bland

Mary Clare Bland, the founder of The Flying Carpet, first started practicing yoga when she was a child, with her grandmother. She has had a formal yoga practice for 19 years, and trained under some of the great Yoga Masters including Shri Pattabhi Jois, the Enlightened Master Shri Mahayogi Paramahansa and Yogi Amrit Desai. She received her teacher training from Yogi Amrit Desai and Master Duncan Wong.  She ran a yoga studio on the Upper East Side of Manhattan, but found that many of her clients were so busy that they could only come 1-2 times a month. Some joked that she should stream live classes — and the idea was born! She operates the studio out of Madrid and streams  live classes around the world. She will soon be offering on-demand classes via a mobile app. She’s also offering signature classes like “Yoga Reboot” and “JetLag Rx” classes that can be taken in person or via download to help frequent travelers get their minds, and bodies, back on track.

Content Strategist- Aubre Andrus

Aubre Andrus is a freelance tech and travel writer who loves working with startups and brands on content strategy, social media marketing, and blogging. Her work has appeared on Mashable, National Geographic Travel, and WBEZ Chicago. Follow her on Twitter @aubreandrus or view her portfolio at aubreandrus.com.



Technology Consultant- Scanlynn Daniel

Scanlynn is a computer software professional based in New York City, with over fifteen years experience in the space. She has a deep love of yoga and travel. She is very excited for the future of The Flying Carpet, and can't wait until immersion technology makes the advances it needs to allow everyone a fully immersive yoga experience.

Launching The Flying Carpet

We are eager to launch this project. But first, we need initial seed capital! As the saying goes, "It takes money to make money." But it takes a lot of other things, too, and we have a track record to prove it. Here's an example of the type of experience we have running yoga schools: Yoga Travel Tree Business Section: Mary Clare's Blog . But we still need money to get this project off the ground.

If enough people donate just $1 (spare pocket change), $5 (a fancy coffee at Starbuck's), or $10 (a juice), that will give us enough funds to launch The Flying Carpet. Just think: if you donate $25, you can stream in a class from here:


Here is where the $13,500 is going:


·Mobile App: Your Portable Yoga Sanctuary

Our app will be able to be used on both iPhones and Android devices. We are ear-marking $8,000 of the funds for its  development. It will:

·  Allow users to phase adjust before traveling, and rapidly phase adjust upon reaching their destinations.

·  Purchase and download MP3s and videos produced by The Flying Carpet.

·  Book and take classes via live video feed: think Madrid, Ibiza, India: anywhere in the world!

Videos: Turn Your Living Room or Hotel Room Into a Yoga Studio

We are earmarking $5,000 of the funds for video development.  We will start with six basic classes, and produce the videos in Spain (lower production costs than in the US but high quality).

MP3s: For When You Need to "Take a Moment"

We are earmarking $500 of the funds for audio development. We will focus on three types of MP3s:

·  Mindfulness exercises

·  Pranayama (breathing exercises)

·  Yoga Nidra

These MP3s will vary in length, from two to forty five minutes. Users can find a lesson that fits within their time constraints and attention tolerances. All will be designed to focus on a specific need such as relaxation, focus, clarity, or sleep.

Other Ways You Can Support The Flying Carpet

We think of each dollar as a point of light. Enough small points can create enough light to illuminate the world.

Any donation is helpful, no matter how small. Spreading this message to everyone you know is the single most helpful thing you can do to help us launch The Flying Carpet aside from, or in addition to, donating money. Any of the following would be deeply appreciated:

·  A "share" on Facebook: http://igg.me/at/The-Flying-Carpet 

·  "Like" us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFlyingCarpetYoga

·  A Tweet: http://igg.me/at/The-Flying-Carpet 

·  Follow us on Twitter: @_flyingcarpet

·  A LinkedIn post:  http://igg.me/at/The-Flying-Carpet 

·  Connect with the founder on Linkedin: linkedin.com/in/maryclarebland

·  An email to your friends

·  Sharing one of our photos on Instagram or Pinterest

·  Follow us on Pinterest: pinterest.com/yogavolar/

·  Word of mouth

·  Posting this on your local yoga studio's Facebook page or website:

http://igg.me/at/The-Flying-Carpet

·  Using any of the Indiegogo share tools

You can also help us by sharing your yoga preferences, and any ideas you would like to see incorporated into this project. If you'd like to do this, please complete the following short survey (there's a small gift for you when you submit the results):

What are your yoga class preferences?


Risks & Challenges

Our team has launched two successful service-oriented businesses in New York City over the past eleven years (one of them a yoga school), and one online business (mindfulness coaching, including selling online videos and MP3s), so we know how to avoid the biggest risks. Scanlynn has worked with a number of app developers and is able to not only source amazing talent, but keep projects both on budget and on schedule.

Thank you everyone that has contributed to our campaign, shared it or even took the time to learn about The Flying Carpet!
We will start teaching yoga classes in Madrid in March, and begin filming videos to put in our app.
For a class schedule, or information on when our app goes live, please visit:
theflyingcarpet.es
If you want to contact us, you can email us at info@theflyingcarpet.es
Talk to us us Twiiter anytime: _flyingcarpet
Thank you and we look forward to meeting you live or online!
The Flying Carpet

The Flying Carpet yoga app: The world is your yoga studio. Visit it anytime anywhere via mobile app.

    

A note from the founder, Mary Clare... 
Too busy for yoga? Not anymore.
While
 running a yoga studio on the Upper East Side of Manhattan, I found my 
client's schedules were so jam-packed that they could practice yoga only
 once or twice a month. Some clients joked that I should stream live 
classes so they could easily take them at home, at work, or while 
traveling. As an extensive world traveler and certified yoga teacher, 
that was a lightbulb moment. I set an intention for 2015: launch The 
Flying Carpet app! 
I've said goodbye 
to the Big Apple and moved permanently to Madrid where I will film yoga 
classes and stream them live as well as offer them on-demand via mobile 
app. The Flying Carpet mobile app will also feature downloadable classes
 like "Yoga Reboot" and "Jet Lag Rx" to help frequent travelers get 
their minds and bodies back on track. We'll take our "flying carpet" 
around the world to film classes in beautiful and inspiring locales -- 
we already have an Ibiza beach class and a Spanish garden class in the 
works. On deck is a traditional asana class from India, the ancient birthplace of India. Classes at The Flying Carpet never take place in your typical 
sterile yoga studio! 




Whether you're 
suffering from wanderlust or traveler's fatigue, The Flying Carpet 
mobile app is for you -- it's made for yogis and travelers of all kinds.
 I can't bring this global yoga sanctuary to life without your help. 
I've found unique spaces to film from in Madrid and around the world but
 I need your help raising funds to pay for the production of the videos 
and the creation of the mobile app. We recently changed our funding goals- we now are targeting $13,00. It's not reflected in our target amount because Indiegogo won't let us change our final amount. So please keep that $13,000 in mind and read on to learn more about our 
business plan and to see some "rough draft" classes. 
Namaste,
Mary Clare
A
Sanctuary for Global Travelers

it's the first yoga studio you can take with you – and yoga used to be practiced on small carpets
before the invention of the modern yoga mat. With The Flying Carpet mobile app,
you can take your favorite class live from anywhere around the world –
or whenever you want. 



The Flying Carpet helps travelers find
balance, cure jet lag and traveler’s fatigue, and take classes on the go. Here’s what you’ll find on The Flying Carpet
mobile app: 

· 
On-Demand
MP3s and Instructional Videos: Our yoga classes, deep breathing exercises, and mindfulness
techniques are available for immediate download and can be practiced anywhere
in the world.





·  Classes from featured locations around the world: Yoga 
travel is the new armchair travel! Our app will continue to feature new 
classes from exciting, exotic locations around the world. Examples: Enjoy a 
sunset vinyasa class on the beach in Ibiza, or a traditional asana class
 from a beautiful Indian garden in Jaipur. We'll feature a different 
location every month, and even include some fun travel tips for those 
locations.




·

specifically-designed breathing exercises and mindfulness techniques that
help traveler’s brains produce anxiety- alleviating chemicals. When you
relax on the plane, you’ll feel great upon arrival.


·  Immersion

under the guidance of an Indian Yoga Master, and receive
both services anywhere in the world.
